Title: Bitcoin price wobbles ahead of Fed‚Äôs rate decision
URL Source: https://cryptobriefing.com/bitcoin-fed-rate-impact/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T01:35:32+00:00
Markdown Content: Bitcoin is set to snap its seven-month growth streak. -----------------------------------------------------
Bitcoin (BTC) dipped as low as $59,500 on Binance ahead of tomorrow‚Äôs Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting. Market participants are bracing for a hawkish stance from the Federal Reserve (Fed), with expectations set for unchanged interest rates.
The CME FedWatch Tool [indicates](https://www.cmegroup.com/markets/interest-rates/cme-fedwatch-tool.html) a mere 4.4% of economists predict a rate cut‚Äîthe first in over a decade‚Äîwhile a dominant 95.6% anticipate rates to hold steady between 525-550 basis points.
According to The Kobeissi Letter, current market data indicates a 36% probability that there will be no interest rate cuts this year. Four months ago, the likelihood of maintaining current rates was only about 3%.
Expectations have also shifted to just one reduction this year. Previously, the market anticipated six rate cuts. Additionally, the probability of experiencing two or more rate cuts has diminished to 31%.
> You can't make this up: > > Prediction markets now show a 36% chance of ZERO interest rate cuts in 2024, according to [@Kalshi](https://twitter.com/Kalshi?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw). > > To put this in perspective, 4 months ago there was a ~3% chance of no rate cuts in 2024. > > The base case has gone from 6 rate cuts to 1 rate cut this year.‚Ä¶ [pic.twitter.com/mTQMDAz99K](https://t.co/mTQMDAz99K) > > ‚Äî The Kobeissi Letter (@KobeissiLetter) [April 25, 2024](https://twitter.com/KobeissiLetter/status/1783526444682936404?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
Stagflation risk ----------------
Amidst this financial climate, the US grapples with stagflation risks as inflation persists and economic growth slows.
[![Image 1: Sapphire](https://static.cryptobriefing.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/18060845/600x500.jpg)](https://sapphire.cryptobriefing.com/?utm_source=cryptobriefing&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=180324&ap=mreciad&offer=x240415070T0U7V)
The first quarter of 2024 saw GDP growth decelerate to 1.6%, falling short of the 2.2% forecast and down from the previous quarter‚Äôs 3.4%. Concurrently, the US Core PCE inflation index climbed from 2.0% to 3.7%.
Fed Chair Jerome Powell stated that recent data does not make the Fed more confident, suggesting a longer timeline to regain economic stability. He expressed belief in the adequacy of current policies to navigate the risks at hand, hinting at sustained high-interest rates without increases.
Bitcoin‚Äôs trajectory mirrored these economic uncertainties, dropping below $62,000 earlier in the week [due to renewed stagflation worries](https://cryptobriefing.com/crypto-market-stagflation-fears/).
A brief rally above $64,000 occurred with [the launch of spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs in Hong Kong](https://cryptobriefing.com/hong-kong-bitcoin-etf-expectation/) yesterday, but the momentum was short-lived as investor caution set in ahead of the Fed‚Äôs key decision.
Slowdown in spot Bitcoin ETF inflows ------------------------------------
The market also observed a notable slowdown in spot Bitcoin ETF inflows, with BlackRock‚Äôs iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT) pausing new inflows for several days‚Äîa first since its debut. Meanwhile, other funds have seen continued outflows, including Grayscale Investments.
Bitcoin‚Äôs price has been static since [the fourth halving event](https://cryptobriefing.com/bitcoin-fourth-halving-event/). According to data from CoinGecko, Bitcoin is currently trading at around $60,100, down over 6% in the last 24 hours, and will likely end its continuous growth streak, which has lasted since last September.
![Image 2: Bitcoin monthly returns](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201105%20602'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Bitcoin monthly returns ‚Äì Source: [Coinglass](https://www.coinglass.com/today)

item.title: News Article 3
item.description:
Title: Musician FKA Twigs Tells Congress She Created Her Own AI Deepfake
URL Source: https://decrypt.co/228907/fka-twigs-ai-deepfakes-digital-replicas-senate-hearing
Published Time: 2024-05-01T01:31:41
Markdown Content: Artificial intelligence was again the hot topic of the day in Washington D.C., as members of the Senate Judiciary Committee heard [testimony](https://www.c-span.org/video/?535268-1/senate-hearing-digital-replicas-ai-concerns&live) from the music industry, unions, and academia about the risks presented by generative AI. The session focused largely on AI-powered digital replicas and deepfakes‚Äîwith one musician sharing her own experiences with the tech.
Copyright and free speech protections were also central themes covered by a variety of guests, including Robert Kyncl, CEO of Warner Music Group, SAG-AFTRA director and chief negotiator Duncan Crabtree-Ireland, University of San Diego School of Law professor Lisa Ramsey, Digital Media Association (DiMA) CEO Graham Davis, and former NBC Universal senior counsel Ben Sheffner.
British actor and musician ‚ÄúFKA Twigs,‚Äù whose real name is Tahliah Debrett Barnett, spoke first-hand about how AI could affect artists.
‚ÄúWe dedicate a lifetime of hard work and sacrifice in the pursuit of excellence‚Äînot only in the expectation of achieving commercial success and critical acclaim, but also in the hope of creating a body of work and reputation that is our legacy,‚Äù FKA Twigs told the committee. ‚ÄúI'm here because my music, my dancing, my acting, the way my body moves in front of the camera, and the way that my voice resonates for a microphone is not by chance. They are essential reflections of who I am.‚Äù
FKA Twigs, 36, will star in the upcoming 2024 reboot of ‚ÄúThe Crow.‚Äù She emphasized the hard work that goes into perfecting an artist‚Äôs craft, aiming to create a sustaining foundation and a lasting legacy, and not just fame.
‚ÄúLet me be clear, I am not against AI,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúAs a future-facing artist, new technologies are an exciting tool that can be used to express deeper emotions, create fantasy worlds, and touch the hearts of many people.‚Äù
FKA Twigs then told the committee that she created a digital replica of herself.
‚ÄúIn the past year, I have developed my own deepfake version of myself that is not only trained in my personality, but that can also use my exact tone of voice to speak many languages,‚Äù she said, noting that it can help her reach a more global fanbase and hone her marketing while she focuses on her craft.
‚ÄúThis, however, is all under my control, and I can grant or refuse consent in a way that is meaningful,‚Äù she noted.
Consent and fair compensation were key factors in the [SAG-AFTRA strike](https://decrypt.co/205299/sag-aftra-ends-strike-after-deal-protect-actors-threat-ai). Earlier this month, the actors‚Äô union inked a [deal](https://decrypt.co/226536/actors-record-labors-ink-a-i-deal-limiting-voice-replication) with key players in the music industry that limits the use of AI with actors‚Äô voices by record labels.
‚ÄúWhat is not acceptable is when my art and my identity can simply be taken by a third party and exploited falsely for their own gain without my consent due to the absence of appropriate legislative control and restriction,‚Äù FKA Twigs added.
[SAG-AFTRA Ends Strike After Deal to Protect Actors From 'Threat of AI'](https://decrypt.co/205299/sag-aftra-ends-strike-after-deal-protect-actors-threat-ai) -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The U.S. actors' union SAG-AFTRA has ended its months-long strike after reaching a "tentative deal" with Hollywood studios that includes provisions to protect actors from the "threat of AI." The Screen Actors Guild-American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (SAG-AFTRA) announced the end of the strike in a Twitter thread, announcing that the TV/Theatrical Negotiating Committee had voted unanimously to approve a tentative agreement with the Alliance of Motion Picture and Television Produc...
In October, a bipartisan group of Senators introduced the ‚Äú[No Fakes Act,](https://decrypt.co/201305/senators-want-ban-ai-copycats-like-fake-drake-weeknd-song)‚Äù aiming to outlaw the creation of AI-generated likenesses without consent. This legislation responds to concerns about AI's use in mimicking individuals in media, highlighted by an unauthorized AI-generated song featuring Drake and The Weeknd.
While many in the entertainment industry have called out AI creators for stealing their vocals and stylings, some artists have [embraced](https://decrypt.co/resources/famous-pop-stars-and-their-views-on-music-ai-from-grimes-to-drake) the technology, including electronic musician Grimes, who, in 2023, encouraged fans to create an AI-generated version of her voice, with a 50% [royalty](https://decrypt.co/137649/grimes-offers-50-royalties-on-ai-generated-music-using-her-voice).
In November, the Beatles used AI to resurrect John Lennon and George Harrison to join Paul McCartney and Ringo Starr in completing their final album, ‚Äú[Now and Then](https://decrypt.co/204170/beatles-final-song-now-and-then-brought-to-life-by-ai).‚Äù In an interview with _Decrypt_ earlier this month, Avenged Sevenfold frontman [Matt Sanders](https://decrypt.co/226059/ai-human-music-fans-wont-care-avenged-sevenfold-frontman) said in 20 years people won't even care whether music was made with AI.
For FKA Twigs, however, the key point is protecting the legacy she spent years creating through her music.
‚ÄúWhat it boils down to is my spirit, my art‚Äîmy brand is my brand,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúI've spent years developing it, and it's mine... it doesn't belong to anybody else for it to be used in a commercial sense or cultural sense, or even just for a laugh.‚Äù
‚ÄúI am me, I am a human being," she continued. "And we have to protect that."
_Edited by [Ryan Ozawa](https://decrypt.co/author/ryanozawa)._

![Image 4: Aptos Price Prediction as Community Welcomes Shinami ‚Äì Where Might APT Go Next?](https://cryptonews.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/1707145877-aptos.png)
Aptos Price Prediction as Community Welcomes Shinami ‚Äì Where Might APT Go Next?
Despite an exciting new partnership with innovative gas credit protocol Shinami, the Aptos (APT) price was subdued on Tuesday.
The Aptos price fell 4.5% on the session from highs around $9.30 to the $8.50s.
The price drop comes amid sell pressure across the crypto space, with most major coins dropping a few percent.
The [debut of Bitcoin and Ether ETFs in Hong Kong was a dud](https://cryptonews.com/news/hong-kongs-new-spot-bitcoin-and-ether-etfs-see-11-2-million-in-trading-volume-on-debut-day.htm), and macro remains a headwind. The [Fed is expected reiterate patience](https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/confounding-us-economic-inflation-data-muddy-feds-rate-path-2024-04-25/) when it comes to rate cuts at tomorrow‚Äôs meeting.
That helped kill any excitement about the partnership with Shinami.
[![Image 5: a man is holding a coin in front of a red background](https://cimg.co/other/906/337275/99bitcoin-tokens-960x200.png)](https://rapi.cryptonews.com/outgoing/906/1/5)
Shinami is a protocol that allows [dApps](https://cryptonews.com/news/how-build-decentralized-application-dapp.htm) to purchase gas credits so that dApp users can transact for free.
> We‚Äôre now on 2 chains! Excited to partner with [@Aptos](https://twitter.com/Aptos?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) to support Move builders, starting with a gas credits program ü§ù. üßµ 1/2 [pic.twitter.com/00lKaCZtwX](https://t.co/00lKaCZtwX) > > ‚Äî Shinami (@ShinamiCorp) [April 29, 2024](https://twitter.com/ShinamiCorp/status/1784992614078615625?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
And Aptos is giving [dApp](https://cryptonews.com/news/what-dapp-can-we-really-trust-dapps-2022.htm) builders some of these credits for free to encourage development.
That should help spur development on the upcoming chain, which is good for its long-term prospects.
That being said, in the short-term, Aptos traders are focused on chart analysis.
With the Aptos price currently 55% down from last month‚Äôs highs, here is where it might go next.
**Aptos Price Prediction ‚Äì Where Might APT Go Next?** -----------------------------------------------------
The $7.50 area is a key zone of support for APT. But with the 21DMA adding downside pressure to the price, a downside break could be coming soon.
That could open the door to a return to late-2023 lows in the $4.70 area.
![Image 6: The $7.50 area is a key zone of support for the Aptos price. But with the 21DMA adding downside pressure to the price, a downside break could be coming soon.](https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/01012808/1714526887-screenshot-2024-04-30-202625.png)
The $7.50 area is a key zone of support for the Aptos price. But with the 21DMA adding downside pressure to the price, a downside break could be coming soon. Source: TradingView
Aptos remains a highly risky altcoin to invest in. Sure, its got a lot of potential.
After all, the blockchain was built by former Facebook developers (who worked on Libra). And, presumably, former Facebook employees are highly competent.
That being said, the blockchain will need to see further adoption to justify its hefty [$3.6 billion market cap](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/aptos/).
As per [DeFi Llama](https://defillama.com/chain/Aptos), it last had $640 million in trade value locked (TVL).
That‚Äôs a good start. But for Aptos to be worth tens of billions it will need to have a TVL in the billions.

Title: ‚ÄòI Will Do My Time‚Äô: Binance Founder Sets Sights on Life After Prison
URL Source: https://decrypt.co/228906/i-will-do-my-time-binance-founder-next-chapter-life-after-prison
Published Time: 2024-05-01T01:05:10
Markdown Content: Crypto billionaire Changpeng ‚ÄúC.Z.‚Äù Zhao took to Twitter hours after being [sentenced to four months in prison](https://decrypt.co/228674/binance-founder-changpeng-zhao-sentence-money-laundering?amp=1) in a Seattle courtroom to thank supporters and call out a ‚Äúsilver lining‚Äù to the months-long legal process.
‚ÄúI will do my time, conclude this phase and focus on the next chapter of my life,‚Äù Zhao [wrote](https://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1785465555899822488?s=46). ‚ÄúI will remain a passive investor (and holder) in crypto. Our industry has entered a new phase.‚Äù
He noted that education will be his post-prison focus‚Äîmost likely through the Giggle Academy, which [he announced in March](https://decrypt.co/222297/embattled-binance-founder-changpeng-zhao-pitches-giggle-academy) while waiting for his day in court.
‚ÄùI would like to thank everyone for your care and support, be it writing letters, showing support on X, or in any other form,‚Äù Zhao [wrote](https://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1785465555899822488?s=46). ‚ÄúThey all mean a lot to me and keep me strong.‚Äù
He also praised his former company and reinforced the overall theme of his court case.
‚ÄúA silver lining of this whole process is that Binance has been under the microscope and funds are SAFU,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúCompliance is super important... Protect users!‚Äù
[Binance Founder Changpeng Zhao Sentenced to 4 Months in Prison for Money Laundering Violations](https://decrypt.co/228674/binance-founder-changpeng-zhao-sentence-money-laundering) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Former Binance CEO Changpeng "CZ" Zhao was sentenced to four months in prison Tuesday, punished after pleading guilty to money laundering violations last year. Changpeng Zhao "had the personnel, resources, and wherewithal to comply with U.S. regulations,‚Äù U.S. District Judge Richard Jones said in Seattle while delivering Zhao‚Äôs sentence. ‚ÄúBut failed at that opportunity." Jones also cited a statement from Zhao that said ‚Äúit was better to ask forgiveness than permission," with the judge that he wa...
Zhao had [pleaded guilty to federal money laundering charges](https://decrypt.co/206873/binance-ceo-changpeng-zhao-step-down-plead-guilty) last year, which focused on a corporate culture at Binance that federal prosecutors say sidelined fraud prevention in favor of growth. He was forced to leave the company and pay a $50 million fine.
The U.S. Department of Justice said Zhao should be subject to enhanced sentencing guidelines due to the severity of his crimes, and [asked the judge for a three-year prison sentence](https://decrypt.co/227779/us-department-of-justice-seeks-3-year-jail-sentence-for-former-binance-ceo-cz). Tuesday's sentencing began with a debate over the appropriate sentence, as prosecutors wanting to use the case to ‚Äúsend a message‚Äù to future bad actors.
U.S. District Judge Richard Jones disagreed, and instead followed the recommendations of the federal probation office. Zhao will receive credit for time already served, and the four-year sentence could include as little as 10 months behind bars with the remaining time under supervised release.
‚ÄúEverything I see about your history and characteristics are of a mitigating nature and a positive nature," Jones told Zhao, according to _The Verge_.
[Embattled Binance Founder Changpeng Zhao Launches ‚ÄòGiggle Academy‚Äô](https://decrypt.co/222297/embattled-binance-founder-changpeng-zhao-pitches-giggle-academy) ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changpeng "CZ" Zhao, the founder of cryptocurrency exchange Binance who stepped down as CEO in November in a settlement over federal money laundering charges, announced plans Monday to launch a new nonprofit online education platform called Giggle Academy. "Let's make basic education accessible and entertaining to children all around the world," he wrote on Twitter, noting that Project Giggle is hiring and that one of the benefits is the chance to work directly with him. "Free basic (grade 1-12...
When Zhao has completed his sentence, his ‚Äúnext chapter‚Äù in education will likely include Giggle Academy, an online education platform for students from first grade through high school. He pitched the project via a concept paper that proposed to ‚Äúmake basic education accessible, addictive and adaptive, to the kids who don't have access to them today, all around the world, for free.‚Äù
> My next project. [@GiggleAcademy](https://twitter.com/GiggleAcademy?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) (No logo yet) > > Free basic (grade 1-12 ish) education, for all. > No revenue. > Gamified. > Adaptive. > > Read the Concept Paper at [https://t.co/knqmZF0sQ8](https://t.co/knqmZF0sQ8) > > We are HIRING. Small team, work directly with CZ. > > ‚Äî CZ üî∂ BNB (@cz\_binance) [March 19, 2024](https://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1769877743607448029?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
‚ÄúWe are looking for teachers who can create digital content,‚Äù he wrote at the time. ‚ÄúI will be a student myself.‚Äù
Just one week ago, he [unveiled](https://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1782967250343072074) the brightly colored, smiling logo for the academy.

Title: Top Crypto Gainers Today on DEXScreener ‚Äì ELON, AMERICA, MONKE
URL Source: https://cryptonews.com/news/top-crypto-gainers-today-on-dexscreener-elon-america-monke.htm
Published Time: 2024-05-01T01:03:10+00:00
Markdown Content: ![Image 1: Joel Frank](https://cimg.co/authors/884/responsive-images/310170788-443905671162233-4489539176282530633-n___media_library_original_300_300.jpg)
Last updated: May 1, 2024 at 01:03 UTC | 3 min read
[![Image 2: an orange button with a white text on it](https://cimg.co/other/523/335247/banner-eng.png)](https://rapi.cryptonews.com/outgoing/523/1/9)
[![Image 3: new presales 2014 with an orange arrow pointing to it](https://cimg.co/other/844/337087/eng-sub-m-1.png)](https://rapi.cryptonews.com/outgoing/844/1/17)
![Image 4: Top Crypto Gainers Today on DEXScreener ‚Äì ELON, AMERICA, MONKE](https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/25225221/1714085541-dexscreener.jpg)
Traders turn to tools such as DEXScreener as they hunt for top crypto gainers today in the on-chain markets / Source: Cryptonews
On a bearish day in the crypto market that was marred by a weak debut to spot Bitcoin and Ether ETFs in Hong Kong and data that reinforced expectations that the Fed will wait longer before cutting interest rates, traders looking for quick gains are flocking to on-chain shitcoin markets as they hunt for top crypto gainers today.
The new crypto ETF launch in Hong Kong attracted only $11 million in first-day trading volumes. Some had been expecting as much as $300 million in first-day trade.
> Hong Kong ETH and Bitcoin ETF launch in 1 picture. > > $300 million "anticipated" volume > $11 million actual volume > > This has got to be one of the worst predictions of all time. [pic.twitter.com/7WfwzSylTE](https://t.co/7WfwzSylTE) > > ‚Äî WhalePanda (@WhalePanda) [April 30, 2024](https://twitter.com/WhalePanda/status/1785255586835108165?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
Meanwhile, data out of the US showed hotter-than-expected wage pressures in Q1, which could complicate the Fed‚Äôs inflation fight.
> US Employment Cost Index Q1: 1.2% (est 1.0%; prev 0.9%) > > [![Image 5: a black screen with the words cofpoker on it](https://cimg.co/other/907/337300/coinpoker-960x200-cryptonews.png)](https://rapi.cryptonews.com/outgoing/907/1/5) > > ‚Äî LiveSquawk (@LiveSquawk) [April 30, 2024](https://twitter.com/LiveSquawk/status/1785285570849022319?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
[Bitcoin](https://cryptonews.com/coins/bitcoin/) (BTC) slipped briefly below $60,000 and hit its lowest level since February.
[Ether](https://cryptonews.com/news/ethereum-news/) (ETH), meanwhile, was probing sub-$3,000 levels and eyeing a test of earlier monthly lows.
With the rest of the [altcoin](https://cryptonews.com/news/altcoin-news/) market a sea of red, traders flocked to the on-chain markets, where newly launched tokens are always pumping.
**On-Chain Markets Explained** ------------------------------
On-chain markets refer to the market for digital assets that have been issued and trade directly on the blockchain.
For example, the world‚Äôs second-largest meme coin [Shiba Inu](https://cryptonews.com/price-predictions/shiba-inu-price-prediction/) (SHIB) is an [ERC-20](https://cryptonews.com/cryptocurrency/best-erc20-wallets/) token issued directly onto Ethereum.
Shiba Inu can be traded directly on the Ethereum blockchain using decentralized exchanges ([DEX](https://cryptonews.com/cryptocurrency/best-decentralized-exchanges/)) like Uniswap.
Newly launched [shitcoins](https://cryptonews.com/cryptocurrency/best-shitcoins-buy/) and [meme coins](https://cryptonews.com/cryptocurrency/best-meme-coins/) can also be traded in the exact same way.
Indeed, new coins are always popping up, and these coins frequently post fast exponential gains.
That‚Äôs because the shitcoin market is highly illiquid, with a small amount of buy/sell pressure able to produce outsized moves.
The prospect of making quick [10x](https://cryptonews.com/videos/top-5-crypto-to-buy-before-2024-10x-potential-crypto-tokens.htm) or more gains is a key reason why on-chain shitcoin markets attract so many investors.
But traders need to be cautious as most as scams. There is next to no barrier for anyone to issue their own token.
Scammers take advantage of this, issuing worthless coins but tricking investors into buying them nonetheless.
[Scams](https://cryptonews.com/exclusives/cryptocurrency-scams.htm) can take the form of [rug pulls](https://cryptonews.com/news/rug-pulls-account-for-majority-of-scams-as-q3-2023-exploits-wipe-out-720-million.htm) (where a project is abandoned and liquidity abruptly pulled) or pump-and-dump schemes.
Alternatively, scammers might insert malicious code into a contract to create unfair trading conditions.
Here are some top crypto gainers today on Ethereum that traders will be monitoring, as per [DEXScreener](https://dexscreener.com/ethereum).
**Top Crypto Gainers Today** ----------------------------
### **Elon (ELON)**
A relatively new Elon Musk-themed meme coin Elon (ELON) is pumping on Tuesday, as per [DEXScreener](https://dexscreener.com/ethereum/0xd6b117076222d95a05032a99f10738103c60d64d).
https://twitter.com/Elon0x69420/status/1785006681350402072
The token has pumped 225% in the past 24 hours to a market cap of $23.2 million. And it last has $1.0 million in locked liquidity.
As per Go+ Security, ELON has two concerning aspects to its smart contract. Investors should note that ELON is probably just another pump-and-dump with no long-term value.
### **America (AMERICA)**
After a strong first day of trade on Monday, meme coin America (AMERICA) has continued its bullish momentum into Tuesday.
The token has reportedly already donated $10,000 to veterans.
> üö®BREAKING: $AMERICA ([@0x1776America](https://twitter.com/0x1776America?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)) on ETH has Officially Donated $10,000 to Veterans in the First 24 Hours of Launch! > > Support this amazing team BELOW! üá∫üá∏ > > ca: 0x1776B223FF636D0d76aDF2290821f176421DD889 [pic.twitter.com/KefPhZ94Hj](https://t.co/KefPhZ94Hj) > > ‚Äî Donald J. Trump üá∫üá∏ News (@DonaldTNews) [April 30, 2024](https://twitter.com/DonaldTNews/status/1785424880441114640?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
As per [DEXScreener](https://dexscreener.com/ethereum/0x66d5871236685ec4470142b6ed86b61fcad0059a), AMERICA was last up 200% in 24 hours and trading with a market cap of $1.4 million.
The token has $130,000 in locked liquidity, reducing rug pull risk. It also has a great ratio of rocket emoji‚Äôs to red flag or shitcoin emoji‚Äôs on DEXScreener.
That suggests it is popular in the community. Still, like ELON, it‚Äôs probably just another pump-and-dump meme coin.
Traders shouldn‚Äôt invest more than they can afford to lose.
### **Monke (MONKE)**
A meme coin called Monke (MONKE) is up 75% in the past 24 hours, as per [DEXScreener](https://dexscreener.com/ethereum/0x615d7eb337e6912acf59331f051525a14fa79a82).
https://twitter.com/MonkecoinERC/status/1784512469479870974
The coin launched four days ago, but has struggled to break out of a $0.0006-$0.002 range.
Its market cap was last $1.4 million, with $250,000 in locked liquidity.
The meme coin has 230 rocket emojis, but 103 red flag emojis on DEXScreener. It only has two concerning aspects to its smart contract.
But like most newly issued coins, it‚Äôs probably just another pump-and-dump.
**Better Alternative to Shitcoins** -----------------------------------
As noted numerous times already, [shitcoin](https://cryptonews.com/cryptocurrency/best-shitcoins-buy/) markets are highly risky.
Investors looking to take on substantial risk for big upside potential should instead consider [presale](https://cryptonews.com/cryptocurrency/what-is-a-crypto-presale/) investing or [ICOs](https://cryptonews.com/news/ico-news/).

item.description:
Title: Wild West? Whitelisted Crypto Wallets Make 3,000,000% Gains on Base Altcoin
URL Source: https://www.cryptoglobe.com/latest/2024/05/wild-west-whitelisted-crypto-wallets-make-3000000-gains-on-base-altcoin/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T01:00:00+00:00
Markdown Content: ![Image 1: a tablet with a stock chart on it](https://media.cryptoglobe.com/2022/02/dylan-calluy-JpflvzEl5cg-unsplash-614x768.jpg)
Two cryptocurrency wallets saw astronomical returns exceeding 30,830 times their initial investment on a memecoin launched on Coinbase‚Äôs Ethereum layer-2 scaling solution [Base](https://www.cryptoglobe.com/latest/2023/02/what-is-base-coinbases-new-layer-2-network/).
According to on-chain analysis service Lookonchain, two cryptocurrency allets whitelisted by the deployer of the meme-inspired cryptocurrency Brett ($BRETT) spent 0.034 ETH worth little over $100 to buy 172.56 million tokens back in February.
These wallets, according to the on-chain analysis service, then sold 122.74 million BRETT tokens for a whopping 890.65 ETH, worth $3.14 million via multiple wallets to get a return of over 3,000,000%.
Whitelisted wallets, it‚Äôs worth noting, are wallets that are [approved](https://www.coinbase.com/pt-pt/learn/tips-and-tutorials/what-is-a-crypto-whitelist) to participate in specific cryptocurrency events such as initial coin offerings, and in this case a social media user [noted](https://twitter.com/shady_oak1/status/1783623226557640708) that a total of 139 addresses were whitelisted, and 108 bought tokens during the whitelist period.
The pseudonymous user has later on noted they believe they ‚Äúknow who owns literally very whitelisted wallet‚Äù for the cryptocurrency and are expected to reveal the data ‚Äúwithin a few days.‚Äù
Per their analysis, BRETT‚Äôs insiders were holding as much as 91% of the cryptocurrency‚Äôs supply before other investors could even buy into the cryptocurrency, and suggested one influencer made ‚Äúnearly 1600 ETH \[$4.8 million\] for tokens they got for marketing that were bought during the whitelist phase.‚Äù > A thread about how [$BRETT](https://twitter.com/search?q=%24BRETT&src=ctag&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) was not actually a fair launch and insiders were holding over 81% of the supply before most people could buy. > > People like [@InvestWithRex](https://twitter.com/InvestWithRex?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) made nearly 1600 ETH for tokens they got for marketing that were bought during the whitelist phase. [pic.twitter.com/kpgiEvEMrY](https://t.co/kpgiEvEMrY) > > ‚Äî shady (@shady\_oak1) [April 25, 2024](https://twitter.com/shady_oak1/status/1783623220580741250?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
Brett, self-proclaimed as the ‚Äúmascot‚Äù of the Base chain, is currently trading at $0.0357, reflecting a decline of more than 11% in the last 24 hours. Its price drop comes after a months-long memecoin trading frenzy on both the Solana and Base networks, with several traders making and losing fortunes off of newly launched digital assets.
In one case, a memecoin saw a dramatic price rise of over 3000% over a 24-hour period, and a cryptocurrency trader managed to take advantage by betting 50 SOL, worth around $9,000, in the cryptocurrency. Its rise has¬†[seen them make a profit of over $123,000.](https://www.cryptoglobe.com/latest/2024/03/memecoin-mania-crypto-trader-turns-50-sol-into-123000-after-newly-launched-token-soars-3000/) Another trader, however, [lost $138,000 in minutes](https://www.cryptoglobe.com/latest/2024/03/crypto-trader-loses-138000-in-35-minutes-trading-little-known-solana-based-altcoin/) trading a little-known token.
In another case, a cryptocurrency trader managed to make a profit of over $3 million trading a newly launched Solana-based memecoin within just 12 minutes after betting nearly $2 million on it right after it started trading.
In yet another incident, a trader, identified on-chain by the alias ‚Äúsundayfunday.sol,‚Äùturn a¬†[$72,000 investment into a staggering $30 million](https://www.cryptoglobe.com/latest/2024/03/solana-sol-trader-turns-72000-into-30-million-in-three-days/)¬†within just three days trading a little-known cryptocurrency.
Various users on the microblogging platform X (formerly known as Twitter), have suggested that the traders making such high-risk investments in these newly launched cryptocurrencies are the developers behind them or marketers helping pump the cryptocurrency‚Äôs price up so they could later sell the tokens at a higher value.
Featured image via¬†[Unsplash](https://unsplash.com/photos/JpflvzEl5cg).

Title: Binance, Polygon lead in this area, but struggle in others - why?
URL Source: https://ambcrypto.com/binance-polygon-lead-in-this-area-but-struggle-in-others-why/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T01:00:00+00:00
Markdown Content: ![Image 1: Binance, Polygon lead in this area, but struggle in others - why?](https://ambcrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/News_Articles_FI_-_Adewale_2-1-1200x686.webp)
* _Binance and Polygon saw more unique addresses than other chains._ * _TVL and volume reduced despite the number of unique addresses._
Recent data indicates that [Binance \[BNB\]](https://ambcrypto.com/category/binance-news/) and [Polygon \[MATIC\]](https://ambcrypto.com/category/polygon-news/) have had the most active addresses. Still, it‚Äôs essential to analyze how this has influenced their volumes and Total Value Locked (TVL).
Additionally, how have BNB and MATIC trended with their networks‚Äô volume of unique addresses?
#### **Binance and Polygon lead rankings**
In a recent ranking of top blockchains by unique addresses conducted by [Crypto Rank](https://twitter.com/CryptoRank_io/status/1784972053956669621?t=_yV0G5iD54nOAQB8A8xL_g&s=19), the [Binance](https://ambcrypto.com/binance-chain-sees-revenue-jump-70-will-it-push-bnb-higher/) Smart Chain and Polygon claimed the top two positions.
According to data from the ranking platform, the Binance Smart Chain had over 444 million unique addresses, while [Polygon](https://ambcrypto.com/polygon-heres-how-matic-reacted-to-franklin-templetons-latest-move/) had over 419 million.
These figures are noteworthy, as the combined total of unique addresses on these platforms surpassed the total volume of unique addresses on the next three platforms.
Furthermore, they outpaced major platforms like [Ethereum \[ETH\]](https://ambcrypto.com/category/ethereum-news/) regarding unique addresses, indicating significant user adoption and activity.
#### **Any impact on volume and TVL?**
Analysis of the volume and Total Value Locked (TVL) on the [Binance](https://ambcrypto.com/bnb-chain-tvl-rises-with-new-addition-but-is-it-still-early-days/) Smart Chain (BSC) using DefiLlama data revealed a lack of significant recent movements.
The network experienced notable activity around March, marked by consecutive spikes in volume, peaking at over $2.5 billion. However, as of the latest data, the volume has decreased to approximately $614 million.
Similarly, the TVL saw a brief spike, reaching over $6.7 billion in the past week, but has since declined to around $5.4 billion.
[![Image 2: Polygon TVL and volume](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20874%20540'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://ambcrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/BNB-volume-and-TVL.png)
Source: DefiLlama
Similarly, AMBCrypto‚Äôs examination of the volume and TVL on [Polygon](https://ambcrypto.com/polygons-1-million-milestone-leaves-matic-whales-with-this-decision/) indicated a lack of recent notable trends.
At the time of analysis, the volume was approximately $69 million, with a recent decline observed. The TVL also stood at around $917 million, showing a recent decline.
[![Image 3: Polygon TVL and volume](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20874%20540'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://ambcrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Polygon-volume-and-TVL.png)
Source: DefiLlama
These metrics suggest that despite the surge in unique addresses, there has yet to be a corresponding increase in activity or engagement on these networks.
#### **BNB and MATIC see a negative start to the week**
AMBCrypto‚Äôs analysis of [BNB](https://ambcrypto.com/bnb-rises-against-bitcoin-what-does-this-mean-for-the-crypto-market/) indicated a departure from its positive start to the week, as the coin experienced a decline in trading.
On the 29th of April, BNB concluded trading with a 1.23% decrease, trading at approximately $592.7. As of this writing, there was a further 1.72% decrease, resulting in a trading price of around $582.9.
[![Image 4: Polygon price trend](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201793%20689'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://ambcrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/BNBUSD_2024-04-30_11-09-49.png)
Source: TradingView
* * *
Realistic or not, here‚Äôs [BNB market cap in BTC‚Äôs terms](https://ambcrypto.com/calculator/marketcap)
* * *
Similarly, [MATIC](https://ambcrypto.com/will-polygon-matic-beat-its-26-drop-climb-back-towards-1/)¬†exhibited a more negative trend, with a downward trajectory observed since the beginning of the week.
At the time of analysis, MATIC was trading at approximately $0.67, reflecting a decline of over 4%.
[![Image 5: Polygon price trend](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201793%20689'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://ambcrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/MATICUSD_2024-04-30_11-12-08.png)
Source: TradingView

Title: Ethereum (ETH) Forms Crucial Ascending Channel, Shiba Inu (SHIB) Might Surprise Us, Will It Revitalize Bitcoin (BTC) Run?
URL Source: https://u.today/ethereum-eth-forms-crucial-ascending-channel-shiba-inu-shib-might-surprise-us-will-it-revitalize
Published Time: 2024-05-01T00:30:00+0000
Markdown Content: ![Image 1: Ethereum (ETH) Forms Crucial Ascending Channel, Shiba Inu (SHIB) Might Surprise Us, Will It Revitalize Bitcoin (BTC) Run?](https://u.today/sites/default/files/styles/736/public/2024-04/47792.jpg)
Cover image via [www.freepik.com](https://www.freepik.com/premium-ai-image/bitcoin-golden-bitcoin-coins-isolated-japanese-candlestick-chart_169542504.htm#position=14)
Disclaimer: The opinions expressed by our writers are their own and do not represent the views of U.Today. The financial and market information provided on U.Today is intended for informational purposes only. U.Today is not liable for any financial losses incurred while trading cryptocurrencies. Conduct your own research by contacting financial experts before making any investment decisions. We believe that all content is accurate as of the date of publication, but certain offers mentioned may no longer be available.
Contents
* [Shiba Inu's volatility drops](#h212) * [Bitcoin's potential fuel](#h321)
[Ethereum](https://u.today/trons-justin-sun-breaks-silence-on-latest-ethereum-bets) has entered an ascending price channel, which could dictate its performance in the short term. This technical formation suggests a cautiously optimistic outlook but also flags potential risks ahead.
The ascending channel observed on Ethereum‚Äôs daily price chart shows that [ETH](https://u.today/sec-boss-has-long-viewed-ethereum-as-a-security-new-filing-reveals) has been achieving higher lows and higher highs, a bullish indicator in traditional market analysis. However, the current positioning near the lower boundary of the channel around $3,000 raises concerns about a possible breakdown acceleration. If Ethereum fails to hold this level, it could see a correction toward the $2,700 mark, which would signify a significant shift in market sentiment and momentum.
![Image 2: ETHUSD Chart](https://u.today/sites/default/files/inline-images/image_738.png)
[ETH/USD Chart by TradingView](https://www.tradingview.com/)
This potential decline to $2,700 is critical as it aligns with the 200 EMA¬†and could serve as a foundation for ETH to stabilize and potentially rebound. However, should [ETH](https://u.today/ethereum-eth-whale-triggers-38-million-sell-off-details) maintain its trajectory within the ascending channel, the immediate resistance to watch is at approximately $3,300. Overcoming this level could pave the way for Ethereum to approach the upper boundary of the channel near $3,500, which would reinforce bullish sentiment and possibly attract further buying pressure.
Whether Ethereum will climb to test new resistances or face a downward correction will largely depend on the recovery of Bitcoin and consistent market inflows which are nonexistent at this point in time.
Shiba Inu's volatility drops ----------------------------
[Shiba Inu](https://u.today/shiba-inu-triggers-268-surge-in-whale-activity-as-price-jumps) shows subdued volatility, which might be preparing the ground for an unexpected rally. Despite a prevailing lack of strong price movements, which typically discourages retail investors seeking quick gains, SHIB's recent trading patterns suggest a potential shift in dynamics.
The meme coin, known for its vibrant community and explosive growth phases, is currently witnessing a consolidation phase that could be a precursor to significant price action. Although recent trading volume has not shown dramatic spikes, a gradual increase in buying activity suggests that investors are accumulating positions, likely in anticipation of future price growth.
Currently SHIB is hovering near a critical support level at approximately $0.00002272. If this level holds, it sets a strong base for the token. However, a breakdown below this support could see SHIB testing further lows around $0.000017.
On the upside, if [SHIB](https://u.today/shytoshi-kusamas-important-message-shared-with-shib-community-details) can gain enough momentum to push through current market sluggishness, the first significant resistance lies near $0.00002690. Overcoming this barrier could validate bullish sentiment, leading to a test of the next resistance at around $0.00002960. Such movements would not only confirm a reversal but could also reignite interest among retail investors who thrive on volatility and dynamic price movements.
The current market situation for SHIB, characterized by its relative stability and increasing purchase volume in quantity, may indeed set the stage for a surprising turn.¬†¬†
Bitcoin's potential fuel ------------------------
[Bitcoin](https://u.today/poloniex-hacker-moves-enormous-32-million-in-bitcoin) and Ethereum spot ETFs have started trading in Hong Kong. It opens new avenues for both local and nonlocal investors who meet the strict regulatory requirements, including comprehensive customer due diligence. The introduction of these ETFs is seen as a significant step forward in the mainstream financial adoption of cryptocurrencies and could potentially serve as a catalyst for Bitcoin's price movement.
Currently, Bitcoin exhibits a sideways trend in the market, accompanied by descending trading volumes, signaling a period of consolidation. Despite this, the launch of ETFs introduces fresh liquidity and could attract institutional investors, potentially invigorating Bitcoin‚Äôs market activity.
From a technical perspective, Bitcoin has been trading in a narrow range, with immediate resistance near the $63,000 mark. This level has acted as a strong resistance point over recent weeks. On the downside, the support at around $59,988 has been crucial in preventing further declines.¬†¬†
If Bitcoin can surpass this threshold, the next significant resistance lies near $65,000. A sustained move above this level might confirm a revitalization of the bullish trend, possibly steering Bitcoin toward higher price points in the near future.

Title: Dogecoin (DOGE) Enters Ideal Accumulation Zone
URL Source: https://beincrypto.com/dogecoin-doge-ideal-buy-zone/
Published Time: 2024-04-30T23:59:00+00:00
Markdown Content: **Dogecoin‚Äôs (DOGE) price is declining on the daily chart, but this is part of a much bigger bullish picture.**
Jumping in at the right time could prove to be beneficial, but there are certain levels that investors must be wary of.
Is It the Right Time to Buy Dogecoin? -------------------------------------
Dogecoin‚Äôs price is expected to show a bullish run in the coming days owing to the value of the meme coin in the market.¬†Based on the Market Value to Realized Value (MVRV) ratio, the altcoin is currently undervalued.¬†
The MVRV ratio measures investor‚Äôs profit and loss. Dogecoin‚Äôs¬†30-day MVRV at -15% signals losses, potentially prompting accumulation.

Sponsored
Historically, DOGE recovery occurs at around -9% to -21%, labeled an opportunity zone.¬†Therefore, the [DOGE accumulated by investors](https://beincrypto.com/coinbase-lists-3-altcoins-futures/) at the current price will likely bear profits once recovery initiates.
**Read More: [How To Buy Dogecoin (DOGE) and Everything You Need To Know](https://beincrypto.com/learn/buy-dogecoin/)**
![Image 3: DOGE/USDT 12-hour chart.](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
Dogecoin MVRV Ratio. Source:¬†[Santiment](https://app.santiment.net/)
Furthermore, investors also show conviction toward a¬†rally.¬†This¬†is derived from the movement of supply within different categories of [HODLers](https://beincrypto.com/learn/the-ultimate-guide-on-the-best-hardware-wallets-in-2024/).
In the last two weeks, the supply held by long-term holders has seen a 9% increase from 38%. At 47%, they are now the largest holders of DOGE supply. These investors are known to hold their assets for more than a year, ascertaining confidence and conviction in the meme coin is high.
This¬†could drive the rally further ahead and sustain the increase.
Sponsored

Dogecoin Supply Distribution. Source:¬†[Into](https://app.intotheblock.com/)[TheBlock](https://app.intotheblock.com/)
DOGE Price Prediction: Breakout Falling Wedge ---------------------------------------------
Trading at $0.137¬†at the time of¬†writing, [Dogecoin is moving within a descending wedge](https://beincrypto.com/doge-price-holders-eye-profits/).¬†This¬†bullish chart pattern is¬†characterized by converging trendlines with lower highs and lower lows, indicating a potential trend reversal when the price breaks out of the wedge formation to the upside.
Thus, [DOGE breaking out](https://beincrypto.com/dogecoin-doge-massive-price-surge/) would¬†likely¬†push the price to $0.168¬†propelled¬†by the market conditions.¬†Breaching this resistance would mark a 24% rally for the meme coin.
**Read More: [Dogecoin (DOGE) Price Prediction 2024/2025/2030](https://beincrypto.com/learn/doge-dogecoin-price-prediction-2019-2020-5-years-updated-04-28-19-doge-usd-reaches-resistance/)**

Dogecoin Price Analysis. Source:¬†[TradingView](https://www.tradingview.com/)

item.title: News Article 13
item.description:
Title: Shiba Inu Sees 144% Spike In Major Metric, But Why Is Price Down? | Bitcoinist.com
URL Source: https://bitcoinist.com/shiba-inu-144-spike-metric/
Published Time: 2024-04-30T21:00:26-05:00
Markdown Content: [![Image 1: the bit starz logo on a black background](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=3854099)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=2104699&setID=579129&channelID=0&CID=770131&banID=521076925&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2029545&adSize=150x45&mt=1714545640319541&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbitcoinist.com%2Fshiba-inu-144-spike-metric%2F&hc=898dacfca8541f6b5bcfdd8908f7141b0cf8638e&location=)
[Shiba Inu (SHIB)](https://bitcoinist.com/shiba-inu-price-in-may/) saw a significant spike in a major metric, which signals a bullish outlook for the second-largest meme coin by market cap. Despite this, Shiba Inu‚Äôs price has failed to react positively, which can undoubtedly be a concern for [token holders](https://bitcoinist.com/shiba-inu-top-5-private-holders/).¬†
Shibarium Sees Increase In Active Accounts¬† -------------------------------------------
[Data](https://www.shibariumscan.io/stats) from Shibariumscan shows that the number of active accounts on the [layer-2 network](https://bitcoinist.com/shiba-inu-shibarium-hard-fork/) rose from 1290 on April 27 to 3,839 on April 28, representing over a 144% increase. Such development is bullish for Shiba Inu, considering how the layer-2 network has been [integral](https://bitcoinist.com/shiba-inu-burns-bright-shib/) to the meme coin‚Äôs success since it [launched last year](https://bitcoinist.com/shiba-inu-shibarium-public/).¬†
[![Image 2: a banner with the words'bitstarz' and an image of a woman in a red dress](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=844202)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=1983102&setID=367529&channelID=0&CID=727083&banID=520891527&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=1911064&adSize=728x90&mt=1714545640321138&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbitcoinist.com%2Fshiba-inu-144-spike-metric%2F&hc=64211fb96c613dceae027fd9bc3ee700fccbd0f7&location=)
Related Reading: [Bitcoin To $300,000? Crypto Pundit Reveals What Will Drive It](https://bitcoinist.com/bitcoin-to-300000-crypto-pundit/)
Shibarium also saw the number of new transactions on the network spike from 4,997 on April 27 to 12,191 on April 28. This is even more bullish for Shiba Inu since the amount of SHIB burns Shibarium carries out depends on the number of transactions it records. Meanwhile, these aren‚Äôt the only recent bullish developments for Shiba Inu.¬†
NewsBTC [recently reported](https://bitcoinist.com/shiba-inu-shibaswap-expands-to-shibarium/) that SHIB‚Äôs foremost decentralized exchange (DEX), ShibaSwap, is [expanding](https://bitcoinist.com/shiba-inu-shib-2024/) to Shibarium. This move is expected to increase ShibaSwap‚Äôs user base and Shibarium‚Äôs, by extension. Shiba Inu will ultimately benefit since an increase in Shibarium‚Äôs user base means more transactions, leading to more [SHIB burns](https://bitcoinist.com/shiba-inu-burn-rate-48554/).¬†
[![Image 3: bbc iPlayer - screenshot](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4141110)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=2392606&setID=476001&channelID=0&CID=878423&banID=521869883&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2311166&adSize=728x90&mt=1714545640321207&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbitcoinist.com%2Fshiba-inu-144-spike-metric%2F&hc=c5cf5b95c22273838fc39b64d075fc1ed335e6d0&location=)
Seeing how these metrics paint a bullish outlook for the meme coin, it isn‚Äôt out of place to wonder why Shiba Inu has experienced [significant price drops](https://bitcoinist.com/dogecoin-shiba-inu-price-red/) lately. One reason for this price decline is Bitcoin‚Äôs price action. [Data](https://app.intotheblock.com/coin/SHIB/deep-dive?group=all&chart=all) from the market intelligence platform [IntoTheBlock](https://bitcoinist.com/bitcoin-time-bull-market-intotheblock-explains-why/) shows that SHIB‚Äôs price correlation with Bitcoin is currently at 0.82%, which suggests a ‚Äústrong positive correlation‚Äù between both tokens.¬†
Related Reading: [BlackRock Spot Bitcoin ETF Grinds To A Halt, Records Longest Stretch Without Inflows](https://bitcoinist.com/blackrock-spot-bitcoin-etf-inflows/)
[![Image 4: a screen shot of a purple and blue background](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4112488)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=2368622&setID=476002&channelID=0&CID=697928&banID=521829420&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2287404&adSize=728x90&mt=1714545640580931&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbitcoinist.com%2Fshiba-inu-144-spike-metric%2F&hc=831d413dde08f38d8e44bc850b2864e9fcb1c224&location=)
Therefore, SHIB‚Äôs price has mirrored [Bitcoin‚Äôs](https://bitcoinist.com/bitcoin-to-300000-crypto-pundit/), which has recorded significant price declines lately. Another reason for Shiba Inu‚Äôs price decline is the drop in large transactions, with data from IntoTheBlock showing a 4.60% drop in this crucial metric.¬†
This suggests that [Shiba Inu whales](https://www.newsbtc.com/shiba-inu/shiba-inu-whales-shib/#:~:text=Shiba%20Inu%20Whale%20Accumulates%20332%20Billion%20SHIB%20Tokens&text=A%20plausible%20explanation%20is%20the,almost%2040%20trillion%20SHIB%20tokens.) are cooling off on their investment in the meme coin, as this recent market downtrend may be affecting their confidence. These whales play a massive role in SHIB‚Äôs price discovery, and the meme coin‚Äôs price could pick up once they recover their confidence in the market.¬†
A drop in Shiba Inu‚Äôs burn rate has also contributed to its recent decline. [Data](https://x.com/shibburn/status/1785172274326184396) from the [burn tracking website Shibburn](https://www.shibburn.com/) shows a 76% decline in the number of SHIB tokens burnt in the past seven days and a 79% decline in the last 24 hours.¬†
![Image 5: Shiba Inu price chart from Tradingview.com](https://www.tradingview.com/x/BOis8WvJ/)
SHIB price falls amid market crash | Source: [SHIBUSDT on Tradingview.com](http://tradingview.com/)
Featured image from Bitget, chart from Tradingview.com
### Sign Up for Our Newsletter!
For updates and exclusive offers enter your email.
![Image 6: Scott Matherson](https://bitcoinist.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Scott-Matherson.jpeg?resize=300%2C300)
Scott Matherson is a leading crypto writer at Bitcoinist, who possesses a sharp analytical mind and a deep understanding of the digital currency landscape. Scott has earned a reputation for delivering thought-provoking and well-researched articles that resonate with both newcomers and seasoned crypto enthusiasts. Outside of his writing, Scott is passionate about promoting crypto literacy and often works to educate the public on the potential of blockchain.

item.description:
Title: ‚ÄòNo signs‚Äô of Bitcoin miner capitulation despite plummeting revenue
URL Source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/no-signs-bitcoin-miner-capitulation-despite-plummeting-revenue-cryptoquant
Published Time: 2024-05-01T01:59:38.000Z
Markdown Content: CryptoQuant CEO Ki Young Ji said that despite a drop in Bitcoin mining revenues since the halving, Bitcoin miners haven‚Äôt shown any signs of capitulation.
5098 Total views
42 Total shares
![Image 1: ‚ÄòNo signs‚Äô of Bitcoin miner capitulation despite plummeting revenue](https://images.cointelegraph.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=90,width=1434/https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2024-04/a5918ce4-b46f-4188-ab12-12ffdae1ff6e.jpg)
Own this piece of crypto history
[Collect this article as NFT](https://mint.cointelegraph.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcointelegraph.com%2Fnews%2Fno-signs-bitcoin-miner-capitulation-despite-plummeting-revenue-cryptoquant&utm_source=cointelegraph_com&utm_medium=button&utm_campaign=articles)
Bitcoin ([BTC](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-price)) miners show no signs of ‚Äúcapitulation‚Äù despite their revenue falling to 14-month lows following the halving event in April.¬†
In an April 30 [post](https://twitter.com/ki_young_ju/status/1785171733454143633?s=46&t=MuRujqZUAz3TQE1vmr3c6A) to X, CryptoQuant CEO Ki Young Ju said that following a drop in revenue to levels post having, Bitcoin miners now face two options, capitulation or await growth in the price of Bitcoin to cover their costs.
> ‚ÄúNow they have two options: 1. Capitulation, or 2. Waiting for a rise in BTC price.‚Äù
Citing the 365-day Puell Multiple chart ‚Äî a metric that estimates the level of sell pressure from miners ‚Äî Ju said miners show no signs of capitulation ‚Äúfor now.‚Äù
![Image 2](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2024-05/e611beb7-3c96-4489-bd56-846460132134.png)
_Bitcoin miner revenue has fallen to lows not seen since Feb. 25, 2023. Source: CrytpoQuant_
Ju‚Äôs analysis comes as a recent crypto price dip has sparked concerns about miner capitulation.
Bitcoin miner revenue soared immediately following the halving with rare satoshi hunters and Runes Protocol degens [paying through the nose](https://cointelegraph.com/news/miners-reap-bitcoin-runes-fees) for space on the first blocks mined after the halving on April 20.
However, the appetite for these novel Bitcoin-based assets has declined in recent weeks ‚Äî weighed down by a wider lull in price action across the crypto market.
‚ÄúMiners had a brief reprieve following the halving as bitcoin‚Äôs price rose, but their profits are now being seriously crunched post-halving now that the spot BTC price is moving against them,‚Äù [said](https://twitter.com/TheBitcoinLayer/status/1785472860632621237) market research provider The Bitcoin Layer in an April 30 post on X.¬†
‚ÄúMiner capitulation risk is on the rise, with profits as squeezed as they are. If bitcoin‚Äôs price continues correcting downward over the next few days and it stretches into a weeks-long spell, big miners are at risk of having to liquidate a bunch of bitcoin on order to hedge themselves," the firm added.
**_Related:_** [**_Bitcoin‚Äôs ‚Äòeuphoria phase‚Äô cools, but a BTC bottom could be near ‚Äî Glassnode_**](https://cointelegraph.com/news/bitcoin-s-euphoria-phase-cools-but-a-btc-bottom-could-be-near-glassnode)
Notably, Bitcoin‚Äôs hashprice ‚Äî the expected value of 1 Terahashes of hashing power per day ‚Äî has fallen to an all-time low of $46.55, down 74% from its post-halving peak, per Hashrate index [data](https://twitter.com/hashrateindex/status/1785423021760549018?s=46&t=MuRujqZUAz3TQE1vmr3c6A).
The price of Bitcoin is currently sitting at $60,400, down 18% from its March 14 all-time high of $73,700 per TradingView data.
Similarly, the second largest cryptocurrency, Ether (ETH), is also down 26% from its yearly high of $4,070 on March 12.
**_Magazine:_** [**_68% of Runes are in the red ‚Äî Are they really an upgrade for Bitcoin?_**](https://cointelegraph.com/magazine/runes-supporters-unlock-bitcoins-potential/)
Explore more articles like this
Subscribe to our Crypto Biz newsletter

item.title: News Article 15
item.description:
Title: DOJ Opposes Dismissal Motion for Tornado Cash Co-founder Amid Crypto-Mixing Crackdown
URL Source: https://www.cryptointelligence.co.uk/doj-opposes-dismissal-motion-for-tornado-cash-co-founder-amid-crypto-mixing-crackdown/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T01:56:32+00:00
Markdown Content: The United States Department of Justice (DOJ) has opposed a motion seeking to dismiss conspiracy and money laundering charges against Roman Semenov, co-founder of Tornado Cash.
The DOJ contended that the defense‚Äôs motion introduced disputed facts best left for jury consideration, arguing it was premature for early-stage motions.
Macro Taking 'Wind' Out of Crypto: Starkiller's Drogen
In response, DOJ prosecutors scrutinized the alleged crimes attributed to Semenov.
They contested the defense‚Äôs portrayal of Tornado Cash, highlighting its inception in 2019 as a crypto mixer service, comprising a website, user interface, smart contracts, and a network of ‚Äúrelayers.‚Äù
Accusing Roman Storm and co-developer [Roman Semenov](https://home.treasury.gov/news/press-releases/jy1702) of conspiring to commit money laundering, operating an unlicensed money transmitter, and violating sanctions, U.S. authorities alleged that Tornado Cash facilitated funds laundering for entities like North Korea‚Äôs Lazarus Group.
While Storm pleaded not guilty to all charges in September 2023 and was released on a $2 million bond, Semenov clarified his role, stating he contributed to code design but disclaimed accountability for its usage.
Semenov‚Äôs legal team emphasized in their motion to dismiss that Tornado Cash doesn‚Äôt function as a custodial mixing service and doesn‚Äôt meet the criteria of a ‚Äúfinancial institution.‚Äù
They argued Storm lacked control over the service to prevent its misuse by entities like Lazarus Group.
**READ MORE: [Franklin Templeton Launches Spot Ether ETF on DTCC Platform Amid SEC Review](https://www.cryptointelligence.co.uk/franklin-templeton-launches-spot-ether-etf-on-dtcc-platform-amid-sec-review/)**
Prosecutors led by Damian Williams countered, holding Semenov accountable for operating the cryptocurrency mixer and accused him of enabling criminal anonymity.
They criticized Tornado Cash‚Äôs co-founders for failing to implement sufficient changes to exclude sanctioned addresses.
These developments coincide with the U.S. government‚Äôs heightened scrutiny of crypto-mixing services.
Recently, on April 24, the CEO and CTO of Samourai Wallet, another cryptocurrency mixer, were arrested and charged with conspiracy to commit money laundering and operating an unlicensed money transmitting business, each carrying a maximum sentence of 20 and five years, respectively.
Ki Young Ju, CEO of CryptoQuant, noted that crypto mixing services aren‚Äôt inherently criminal, responding to the arrests of Samourai Wallet‚Äôs founders.
* * *
_To submit a [crypto press release (PR)](https://www.cryptointelligence.co.uk/category/press-releases/), send an email to [sales@cryptointelligence.co.uk](mailto:sales@cryptointelligence.co.uk)._

item.title: News Article 16
item.description:
Title: Why Worldcoin will reach $7 soon despite price drop
URL Source: https://ambcrypto.com/why-worldcoin-will-reach-7-soon-despite-price-drop/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T03:00:57+00:00
Markdown Content: ![Image 1: Why Worldcoin will reach $7 soon despite price drop](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201200%20686'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
* _Holders are coping with unrealized losses, indicating a possible buying opportunity._ * _Circulation decreased, suggesting validation of the bounce to $.7.46._
[Worldcoin‚Äôs \[WLD\]](https://ambcrypto.com/predictions/worldcoin-wld-price-prediction) price might have decreased by 45.17% in the last 30 days, but signals on-chain showed that the decline could be a blessing in disguise.
For starters, AMBCrypto evaluated the Market Value to Realized Value (MVRV) ratio. According to data obtained from Santiment, WLD‚Äôs 30-day MVRV ratio was -24.86%.
This data implied that most holders of the token were sitting on an unrealized loss. Therefore, if they all decide to sell, the average holder would have to deal with a lower investment value.
But that is unlikely to happen. For the price, the [metric‚Äôs position](https://app.santiment.net/charts/F14AhcIp__sCl) could be a good buying opportunity before Worldcoin begins to bounce.
[![Image 2: Increaing development and declining circulation on Worldcoin](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%202560%20867'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://ambcrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/worldcoin-buying-opportunity.png)
Source: Santiment
#### Returns are about to be better
This inference did not come out of the blue, and history showed that a double-digit decline in the MVRV ratio has almost always been a good level for recovery.
For instance, when the metric was at -22.25% in January, the price rallied from $2.50 to $11.88 a few weeks later. However, this does not imply that Worldcoin would produce a similar return in the short term.
However, there is a high chance that the WLD might hit $7.42 as this would leave the average return at $24.57%. Irrespective of the bullish signal, participants have to be on the lookout.
One reason for this was Worldcoin‚Äôs [decision](https://worldcoin.org/blog/announcements/circulating-supply-update-sales-trading-firms) to inflate its circulating supply. According to the project, the increase was to meet the demand for its orb-verified World IDs.
However, the statement mentioned that the team would only release 0.1% to 0.4% of the extra supply weekly. If demand for the token increases as supply jumps, then WLD might be able to validate the prediction to $7.
On the other hand, a bearish market condition without [maximum bids](https://ambcrypto.com/worldcoin-bulls-spring-into-action-but-is-it-too-late-for-wld/) for the token might stall the price rise. Meanwhile, the one-day circulation dropped to 1.87 million, according to Santiment.
This decline implied that fewer WLDs have been engaged in transactions. As such, selling pressure might be minimal. Furthermore, development activity was [starting to pick up](https://app.santiment.net/charts/bbG0fviK__sCl) again on the Worldcoin network.
[![Image 3: Increaing development and declining circulation on Worldcoin](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%202560%20867'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://ambcrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/worldcoin-development-and-circulation.png)
Source: Santiment
#### Targets begin at the upper resistance
The uptrend suggested that the project might be shipping out a new feature soon. Should this swing continue, it could be a bullish validation that could impact the token‚Äôs price.
Besides the on-chain viewpoint, it is also important to check the potential from the technical perspective. On the daily chart, WLD formed a descending channel that lasted from the 9th of March till the time of writing.
However, it seemed that the bulls had found support at $4.43, and were committed to defending the area.
* * *
Is your portfolio green? Check out the [WLD Profit Calculator](https://ambcrypto.com/calculator/profit)
* * *
Furthermore, the Relative Strength Index (RSI) was close to being oversold, indicating that a bounce could be close.
[![Image 4: WLD price analysis](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201355%20691'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://ambcrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/worldcoin-price-prediction-and-analysis.png)
Source: TradingView
The Money Flow Index (MFI) also indicated a similar signal. Should this prediction play out, the next target for Worldcoin could be a rise to $7.46.

item.title: News Article 17
item.description:
Title: New Era In Crypto? Stablecoin Legislation Could Eclipse Bitcoin ETF Impact - Bitwise CIO
URL Source: https://bitcoinist.com/crypto-stablecoin-legislation-eclip-bitcoin-bitwise/
Published Time: 2024-04-30T22:00:56-05:00
Markdown Content: The US Congress could catalyze a more significant shift than introducing [spot Bitcoin ETFs](https://bitcoinist.com/expert-flags-dangers-of-spot-bitcoin-etfs/). Bitwise Chief Investment Officer Matt Hougan‚Äôs view¬†[underscores](https://experts.bitwiseinvestments.com/cio-memos/stablecoins-bigger-than-bitcoin-etfs) a pivotal moment for the crypto industry.
Hougan suggests that 2024 could see ‚Äúgroundbreaking‚Äù legal frameworks that pave the way for mainstream stablecoin adoption, which might profoundly impact the crypto ecosystem.
[![Image 1: a banner with the words'bitstarz' and an image of a woman in a red dress](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=844202)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=1983102&setID=367529&channelID=0&CID=727083&banID=520891527&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=1911064&adSize=728x90&mt=1714545941198099&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbitcoinist.com%2Fcrypto-stablecoin-legislation-eclip-bitcoin-bitwise%2F&hc=9c65b4d35fdf12a41bde5ccd3de4e9a10b2f3b57&location=)
A Legislative Leap Forward --------------------------
Recent [remarks](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7vLftqnwppc) by Maxine Waters, Ranking Democrat of the House Financial Services Committee, highlighted progress towards stablecoin regulation.
Waters‚Äô announcement that she and Committee Chair Patrick McHenry are close to finalizing a [stablecoin bill](https://bitcoinist.com/coin-center-opposes-unconsititutional-stablecoin/) indicates bipartisan momentum, which could soon materialize into law.
Matt Hougan emphasized the underappreciated significance of this development in his recent communication to Bitwise clients. He believes comprehensive legislation could anchor stablecoins in the mainstream financial system, potentially enhancing their role in global economics.
[![Image 2: bbc iPlayer - screenshot](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4141110)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=2392606&setID=476001&channelID=0&CID=878423&banID=521869883&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2311166&adSize=728x90&mt=1714545941197690&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbitcoinist.com%2Fcrypto-stablecoin-legislation-eclip-bitcoin-bitwise%2F&hc=d3fb097ccff2cb67edba87c8d3d77712c8b6f40f&location=)
Hougan identifies multiple drivers behind the bipartisan push for stablecoin legislation. One significant factor is the potential for stablecoins to ‚Äúbolster‚Äù the US dollar‚Äôs dominance as the global reserve currency.
Moreover, stablecoins are major purchasers of US Treasuries, placing them among the top sovereign holders globally.
[![Image 3: a screen shot of a purple and blue background](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4112488)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=2368622&setID=476002&channelID=0&CID=697928&banID=521829420&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2287404&adSize=728x90&mt=1714545941385630&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbitcoinist.com%2Fcrypto-stablecoin-legislation-eclip-bitcoin-bitwise%2F&hc=3b9f3ccfd4f46779c5f3b81a90400d6448822598&location=)
![Image 4: The global crypto market cap value on TradingView](https://www.tradingview.com/x/XHbDgUHc/)
The global crypto market cap value on the 1-day chart. Source: Crypto TOTAL Market Cap on [TradingView.com](https://www.tradingview.com/chart/HSuSIPeM/?symbol=CRYPTOCAP%3ATOTAL)
The economic incentives are equally compelling, according to Hougan. For instance, [Tether‚Äôs profitability](https://bitcoinist.com/tether-splits-into-four-divisions/) with minimal staff compared to traditional banking giants like [Goldman Sachs](https://bitcoinist.com/goldman-sachs-maintains-crypto-skepticism/) illustrates the operational efficiency and financial potential of stablecoins. Such dynamics are enticing Wall Street to advocate for entry into the stablecoin arena.
The Bitwise CIO noted:
> You can bet your bottom stablecoin: Wall Street is lobbying to be let into the stablecoin game.
The Bigger Picture For Crypto Investors ---------------------------------------
The passage of stablecoin legislation could redefine the landscape of financial transactions. Institutions like JPMorgan might transition from crypto skeptics to proponents, integrating blockchain technologies into their operations.
Hougan predicts that adopting crypto wallets, combined with the efficiency of blockchain-based payment systems, could soon become standard, driven by innovations such as Stripe‚Äôs ‚Äú[pay with stablecoins](https://x.com/collision/status/1783559623511011535)‚Äù feature and Visa‚Äôs analytics on [rising stablecoin usage](https://visaonchainanalytics.com/).
While stablecoins do not offer appreciation potential, investors can find opportunities in the infrastructure supporting them.
Hougan points to Layer 1 blockchains like Ethereum and Solana, which host substantial stablecoin volumes and many decentralized applications (DeFi).
As the legislative environment becomes more favorable, these technologies are poised for significant growth, reflecting a broader acceptance and integration of crypto into mainstream finance. Hougan concluded:
> In other words: Crypto is poised to take another huge leap into the mainstream.
Meanwhile, the stablecoin market remains strong, with a capitalization of approximately $166 billion, according to [DeFIllama](https://defillama.com/hacks). In contrast, the inflows and outflows in the spot Bitcoin ETF market have been [less substantial](https://bitcoinist.com/blackrock-spot-bitcoin-etf-inflows/), highlighting a shift in investor focus as of now.
> Yesterday‚Äôs ETF flows by [@FarsideUK](https://twitter.com/FarsideUK?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) were negative once again, with $83.6 million of outflows.[$GBTC](https://twitter.com/search?q=%24GBTC&src=ctag&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) had $82.4 million of outflows. > Fidelity did $2.8 million of outflows, Bitwise $3.8 million. > > Blackrock holding at 0 for 3rd day in a row. > > Price dumped after hours because of DTC‚Ä¶ [pic.twitter.com/ocUF6zUroH](https://t.co/ocUF6zUroH) > > ‚Äî WhalePanda (@WhalePanda) [April 27, 2024](https://twitter.com/WhalePanda/status/1784072215782146052?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
Featured image from Unsplash, Chart from TradingView

Title: Bitcoin Price Nosedives, Can Bulls Save The Key Support at $60K?
URL Source: https://www.newsbtc.com/analysis/btc/bitcoin-price-nosedives-60k/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T02:54:31Z
Markdown Content: _Bitcoin price took a hit and even spiked below $60,000. BTC could gain bearish momentum if there is a daily close below the $60,000 support zone._
* Bitcoin started another decline and traded below the $61,200 zone. * The price is trading below $62,000 and the 100 hourly Simple moving average. * There is a connecting bearish trend line forming with resistance at $60,400 on the hourly chart of the BTC/USD pair (data feed from Kraken). * The pair could accelerate lower if it fails to recover above $60,400 and then $62,000 this week.
Bitcoin price started another decline below the [$62,500 support level](https://www.newsbtc.com/analysis/btc/bitcoin-price-bounces-back-64500/). BTC dropped below the $61,200 level as the bears took control. They even managed to push the price below $60,000.
A low was formed at $59,110 and the price is now consolidating losses. There was a minor increase above the $60,000 level and the 23.6% Fib retracement level of the recent decline from the $64,738 swing high to the $59,110 low.
![Image 1](https://servedbyadbutler.com/error/blank.gif)
[![Image 2: bbc iPlayer - screenshot](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4141110)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=2392605&setID=366606&channelID=0&CID=878423&banID=521869883&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2311165&adSize=728x90&mt=1714545964167928&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.newsbtc.com%2Fanalysis%2Fbtc%2Fbitcoin-price-nosedives-60k%2F&hc=edd21564515aaa4e57ee0ebe4347c7f51a779454&location=)
Bitcoin is now trading below $61,500 and the [100 hourly Simple moving average](https://www.newsbtc.com/analysis/btc/bitcoin-price-grinds-lower-62k/). Immediate resistance is near the $60,400 level. There is also a connecting bearish trend line forming with resistance at $60,400 on the hourly chart of the BTC/USD pair.
The first major resistance could be $61,200. The next key resistance could be $62,000 or the 50% Fib retracement level of the recent decline from the $64,738 swing high to the $59,110 low.
[![Image 3: Bitcoin Price](https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Bitcoin.png?resize=1024%2C461)](https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Bitcoin.png?resize=1024%2C461)
[![Image 4: a screen shot of a purple and blue background](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4112492)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=2368656&setID=452518&channelID=0&CID=697925&banID=521829427&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2287438&adSize=728x90&mt=1714545964225127&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.newsbtc.com%2Fanalysis%2Fbtc%2Fbitcoin-price-nosedives-60k%2F&hc=8154a566198b2a1391a00079049184bb7db126e6&location=)
Source: [BTCUSD on TradingView.com](https://www.tradingview.com/symbols/BTCUSD/)
A clear move above the $62,000 resistance might send the price higher. The next resistance now sits at $62,500. If there is a clear move above the $62,500 resistance zone, the price could continue to move up. In the stated case, the price could rise toward $64,000.
More Downsides In BTC? ----------------------
If Bitcoin fails to rise above the $60,400 resistance zone, it could continue to move down. Immediate support on the downside is near the $59,500 level.
[![Image 5: a gold and black poker chip with the words huge get bonus](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4118444)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=2374570&setID=452519&channelID=0&CID=873125&banID=521839794&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2293220&adSize=728x90&mt=1714545964372101&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.newsbtc.com%2Fanalysis%2Fbtc%2Fbitcoin-price-nosedives-60k%2F&hc=9017e414a200067f5f39ac2c05f1851450699f2a&location=)
The first major support is $59,100. If there is a close below $59,100, the price could start to drop toward $58,000. Any more losses might send the price toward the $56,400 support zone in the near term.
Technical indicators:
Hourly MACD ‚Äì The MACD is now gaining pace in the bearish zone.
Hourly RSI (Relative Strength Index) ‚Äì The RSI for BTC/USD is now below the 50 level.
Major Support Levels ‚Äì $59,500, followed by $59,100.
Major Resistance Levels ‚Äì $60,400, $61,200, and $62,000.
Disclaimer: The article is provided for educational purposes only. It does not represent the opinions of NewsBTC on whether to buy, sell or hold any investments and naturally investing carries risks. You are advised to conduct your own research before making any investment decisions. Use information provided on this website entirely at your own risk.
