item.description:
Title: 'Pharma Bro' Martin Shkreli Teases Binance Co-Founder Changpeng Zhao With A Supposed Prison Menu: 'Burger
URL Source: https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/24/04/38539837/pharma-bro-martin-shkreli-teases-binance-co-founder-changpeng-zhao-with-a-supposed-prison-
Published Time: 2024-04-30T22:14:51.000-04:00
Markdown Content: **Martin Shkreli**, the infamous former pharmaceutical executive, recently made an intriguing comment on social media platform X, hinting at his prison life. This comes as **Changpeng Zhao**, the co-founder of **Binance** BNB/USD, has been sentenced to prison.
**What Happened**: Shkreli, who is known as the ‚Äú**Pharma Bro**,‚Äù took to social media platform X to comment on a post by billionaire Binance Co-Founder Changpeng Zhao. Shkreli wrote, ‚Äúburgers on wednesday, chicken on Thursday,‚Äù hinting at the prison menu.
Shkreli has been known for sharing [advice on prison life](https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/24/03/37764805/sam-bankman-fried-considered-coming-out-as-a-republican-on-tucker-carlsons-show-after-ftxs). In November, he boasted to **Tucker Carlson** that **Sam Bankman-Fried** had sought his advice on serving time in prison, as the FTX founder faced a potential sentence of over 100 years.
Shkreli was released from federal prison in May 2022 after serving approximately five years. Following a lawsuit by the Federal Trade Commission, he was ordered to repay $64 million and faced a lifetime ban, which he contested as excessive and limiting his freedom of speech.
According to Martin Shkreli‚Äôs verified account on X, he [announced](https://x.com/wagieeacc/status/1778826437576790225) that he would be moving his account to ‚Äò@martinshkreli,‚Äô expressing apologies for any messages sent from the previous account due to it being set as default on his iPhone and acknowledging his laziness.
On the other hand, Zhao, the co-founder and former CEO of Binance, has been [sentenced to four months in prison](https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/24/04/38532677/former-binance-ceo-changpeng-zhao-sentenced-to-four-months-in-prison) for his involvement in the failure to establish an effective anti-money laundering (AML) program at the cryptocurrency exchange. Despite his personal situation, Zhao emphasized the importance of compliance in the crypto industry.
_See Also: [Bitcoin‚Äôs Short-Term Holder Realized Price At $59,800; Analyst Says Falling Below This Could Trigger Notable ‚ÄòPrice Corrections‚Äô](https://www.benzinga.com/analyst-ratings/analyst-color/24/04/38508352/bitcoins-short-term-holder-realized-price-at-59-800-analyst-says-falling-below-this?itm_source=parsely-api)_
**Why It Matters**: Zhao‚Äôs legal troubles have been a point of concern in the cryptocurrency industry. Just a week before his sentencing, Zhao [surrendered his voting power in Binance](https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/24/04/38315241/binance-secures-major-win-with-dubai-crypto-license-after-changpeng-zhao-surrenders-voting), which led to the exchange securing a crucial regulatory license in Dubai. This move was seen as a significant step towards Binance‚Äôs compliance with global regulations.
Earlier in April, the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) had [pushed for a three-year prison term](https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/24/04/38401035/binance-founder-changpeng-zhao-apologizes-doj-pushes-for-3-year-sentence) for Zhao, citing serious lapses in regulatory compliance during his tenure at Binance. Despite the legal challenges, Binance has continued to operate, and Zhao‚Äôs recent tweet indicates his commitment to the industry‚Äôs compliance and development.
**Price Action**: As of the latest update, BNB is trading at $573.32, marking a decrease of 4.76% over the past 24 hours and a 5.42% decline over the last week. Meanwhile, **Bitcoin** BTC/USD is currently priced at $60,215.92, reflecting a 6.73% drop in the last 24 hours, according to the data [from Benzinga Pro](https://pro.benzinga.com/dashboard).
_Read Next: [Shiba Inu‚Äôs Burn Rate Soars, Cathie Wood Believes Ethereum Could Catch Up To Bitcoin And More: Top Crypto](https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/24/04/38478293/shiba-inus-burn-rate-soars-cathie-wood-believes-ethereum-could-catch-up-to-bitcoin-and-mor?itm_source=parsely-api)_
Binance‚Äôs Changpeng Zhao. Photo via Flickr
* * *
Engineered by **Benzinga Neuro**, Edited by **[Kaustubh Bagalkote](https://www.benzinga.com/topic/Kaustubh-Bagalkote)**

item.title: News Article 20
item.description:
Title: Crypto Figure Says Consensys Might ‚ÄúNeed Prayers‚Äù
URL Source: https://bitcoinist.com/unrealistic-demands-crypto-figure-says-consensys-might-need-prayers/
Published Time: 2024-04-30T23:00:10-05:00
Markdown Content: Ethereum (ETH) has faced some regulatory turmoil amid rumors of a [rejection](https://bitcoinist.com/ethereum-etfs-on-hold-us-regulators-expected-to-block-spot-products-in-may/) of ETH spot exchange-traded funds (ETF) in May. The second largest cryptocurrency has also been in the spotlight after a key component in its ecosystem, Consensys, sued the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) for ‚Äúunlawful seizure of authority‚Äù over the asset.
The lawsuit sparked different conversations, including the SEC‚Äôs regulatory inconsistencies and speculation about the relationship between the US agency and people close to Ethereum.
[![Image 1: a banner with the words'bitstarz' and an image of a woman in a red dress](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=844202)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=1983102&setID=367529&channelID=0&CID=727083&banID=520891527&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=1911064&adSize=728x90&mt=1714546017944331&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbitcoinist.com%2Funrealistic-demands-crypto-figure-says-consensys-might-need-prayers%2F&hc=2d26547b4febae71780e16d4eeffa5fd9c0168bc&location=)
On April 25, blockchain software company Consensys filed a [lawsuit](https://bitcoinist.com/consensys-sues-sec-over-ethereum-regulation/) against the US SEC. The lawsuit seeks a court ruling that declares ETH is not a security.
The news opened a broad discussion among crypto community members about the implications of the demand. Moreover, it reignited the ETH Gate discussion, which saw Ripple‚Äôs CTO David Schwartz and Cardano‚Äôs Founder Charles Hoskinson in a heated back-and-forth [on X](https://x.com/JoelKatz/status/1784688215842251240).
A crypto figure has deemed Consensys‚Äô demands as unrealistic amid the discussions. Pseudonym crypto sleuth Dr. Huber [shared](https://x.com/Leerzeit/status/1785204074658353464) the ‚ÄúPrayer for Relief‚Äù section of the lawsuit, asserting that the software company ‚Äúreally needs some prayers.‚Äù
[![Image 2: a screen shot of a purple and blue background](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4112488)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=2368621&setID=476001&channelID=0&CID=697928&banID=521829420&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2287403&adSize=728x90&mt=1714546017946238&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbitcoinist.com%2Funrealistic-demands-crypto-figure-says-consensys-might-need-prayers%2F&hc=6a42aff24e65131a2399b7e9d1cc2ed71902e1e5&location=)
Besides classifying Ethereum as a non-security, Consensys is praying for the court to declare that any investigation or enforcement on the company over ETH transactions being classified as security would exceed the SEC‚Äôs authority.
![Image 3: Crypto, Consensys](https://bitcoinist.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/IMG_3020.jpg?w=331&resize=331%2C660)
[![Image 4: a screen shot of a purple and blue background](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4112488)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=2368622&setID=476002&channelID=0&CID=697928&banID=521829420&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2287404&adSize=728x90&mt=1714546018261593&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbitcoinist.com%2Funrealistic-demands-crypto-figure-says-consensys-might-need-prayers%2F&hc=1d91f56c43f6f10b984df311ccab20593387262a&location=)
Consensys' Prayer for Relief. Source: Dr. Huber on X
Similarly, the firm demands that any action against the company based on its operating as a ‚Äúbroker‚Äù under the Exchange Act through its MetaMask wallet would be outside the SEC‚Äôs Authority.
Additionally, Consensys is asking for a ‚Äúpermanent injunctive relief prohibiting the SEC and its officers and agents from pursuing any investigation or enforcement action‚Äù related to the Swap of Staking features of its MetaMask software.
According to the crypto figure, the chance of a court giving a company and its subsidiaries ‚Äúa general and permanent lifetime free pass against SEC Securities investigations‚Äù is minimal.
The crypto sleuth [considers](https://x.com/Leerzeit/status/1785204889141882972) that approval of Consensys‚Äô requests would mean that ‚Äúno ETH transaction could ever be considered a securities offering,‚Äù which reduces the probability of a ruling in favor of the company.
Unclear Regulatory Framework For Cryptocurrencies -------------------------------------------------
Ethereum‚Äôs classification by the regulator is among the topics where clarity has been [missing](https://bitcoinist.com/secs-gary-gensler-crumbles-when-asked-if-ethereum-is-a-security/). Under the previous SEC Chair Jay Clayton, the second-largest cryptocurrency was not considered a security.
Moreover, in his 2018 speech, former Director of the Division of Corporation Finance Bill Hinman classified Ethereum and Bitcoin as non-securities.
However, recent [reports](https://bitcoinist.com/sec-chair-genslers-stance-on-ethereum/) allege that the regulator has considered ETH an ‚Äúunregistered security‚Äù for over a year. The SEC has been seemingly investigating the cryptocurrency status with ‚Äúunusual secrecy‚Äù since March 2023.
The definite classification of digital assets as security could have significant implications for the crypto industry. The Consensys lawsuit has highlighted the SEC‚Äôs unclear regulatory framework.
The agency‚Äôs inconsistency was pointed out by the Chairman of the Financial Services Committee, Patrick McHenry. In a Tuesday statement, Chair McHenry affirmed that SEC‚Äôs current Chairman Gary Gensler ‚Äúknowingly misled Congress.‚Äù
> [#ICYMI](https://twitter.com/hashtag/ICYMI?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw): New court filings indicate that [@SECGov](https://twitter.com/SECGov?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) Chair Gary Gensler knowingly misled Congress when pressed on the classification of [#ETH](https://twitter.com/hashtag/ETH?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) at a [@FinancialCmte](https://twitter.com/FinancialCmte?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) hearing to conduct oversight of his agency. > > üìñ Read my full statement üëá [pic.twitter.com/8osMpbY6Iu](https://t.co/8osMpbY6Iu) > > ‚Äî Patrick McHenry (@PatrickMcHenry) [April 30, 2024](https://twitter.com/PatrickMcHenry/status/1785317163110130028?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
Per the statement, Gensler refused to answer questions regarding the SEC‚Äôs classification of ETH, which shows an ‚Äúintentional attempt to misrepresent the Commission‚Äôs position.‚Äù
An adverse ruling would contradict the SEC‚Äôs previous guidance and extend the agency‚Äôs regulatory grip. Similarly, it would also dispute the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) classification of the asset as a commodity.
Ultimately, it would show ‚Äúyet another example of the arbitrary and capricious nature of the agency‚Äôs regulation by enforcement approach to digital assets.‚Äù
![Image 5](https://bitcoinist.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/ETHUSDT_2024-04-30_08-08-11.png?w=980&resize=980%2C556)
Ether is trading at $3,000 in the seven-day chart. Source: ETHUSDT on [TradingView](https://www.tradingview.com/x/srOC5t6X/)
Featured Image from Unsplash.com, Chart from TradingView.com

Title: Doge With Hat (DOGEHAT) Will Rally5,500%, as Shiba Inu and Bonk Lag
URL Source: https://www.cryptointelligence.co.uk/doge-with-hat-dogehat-will-rally5500-as-shiba-inu-and-bonk-lag/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T03:53:03+00:00

Doge With Hat (DOGEHAT), a Solana memecoin that was launched today, is aiming to challenge other memecoin giants, such as Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Bonk (BONK).
Macro Taking 'Wind' Out of Crypto: Starkiller's Drogen
Early investors in SHIB and BONK made astronomical returns, and Doge With Hat presents a similar opportunity.
[Doge With Hat](https://dexscreener.com/solana/9dhk1fjchrpmxtuheffxg8ytvgssozvyc5pp3casyeml) has market cap below $10,000 at the moment, meaning that when it just reaches a modest market cap of $200,000-$500,000, early investors would generate returns of 2,000%-5,000% in a matter of days or hours.
The exciting memecoin is poised to rally 5,300% in the coming two days, and Doge With Hat could potentially reach a multi-million dollar market cap within a few weeks.
Currently, Doge With Hat can only be purchased via Solana decentralized exchanges, like [Jupiter](https://jup.ag/swap/SOL-USDC) and [Raydium](https://beta.raydium.io/swap/), and early investors stand to make huge returns in the coming days.
To buy Doge With Hat on these platforms, users need to connect their Solflare, MetaMask or Phantom wallet, and swap Solana for Doge With Hat by entering its contract address ‚Äì **2Tw3MJ2wCZZte6GvfaqVch3WQnwfdJByST7ih7e62yjb** ‚Äì in the receiving field.
In fact, early investors could make returns similar to those who invested in Bonk (BONK) and Dogecoin (DOGE) before these memecoins went viral and exploded in price.
If this happens, a new wave of memecoin millionaires could be created in a matter of weeks ‚Äì or potentially even sooner.
The Solana memecoin craze continues amid larger memecoins, like Shiba Inu (SHIB), Bonk (BONK), and DogWifHat (WIF) trading sideways in recent weeks and losing momentum.
This is why many SHIB, BONK and WIF investors are instead investing in new Solana memecoins, like [DOGEHAT](https://dexscreener.com/solana/9dhk1fjchrpmxtuheffxg8ytvgssozvyc5pp3casyeml).

item.title: News Article 22
item.description:
Title: RWA protocols are closing in on $8B total value locked: Messari
URL Source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/real-world-asset-protocols-near-eight-billion-total-value-locked-messari
Published Time: 2024-05-01T03:37:54.000Z
Markdown Content: The TVL across real-world asset tokenization protocols has surged almost 60% since February, says blockchain analytics firm Messari.
856 Total views
1 Total shares
![Image 1: RWA protocols are closing in on $8B total value locked: Messari](https://images.cointelegraph.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=90,width=1434/https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2024-05/3ffa3569-ac29-452c-af62-2023c111cfee.jpg)
Own this piece of crypto history
[Collect this article as NFT](https://mint.cointelegraph.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcointelegraph.com%2Fnews%2Freal-world-asset-protocols-near-eight-billion-total-value-locked-messari&utm_source=cointelegraph_com&utm_medium=button&utm_campaign=articles)
Real-world asset tokenization protocols have seen explosive growth over the last year with the total value locked (TVL) across the sector surging to a new all-time high.
In a May 1 post to X, blockchain analytics and research firm Messari [wrote](https://twitter.com/messaricrypto/status/1785448731803807800) that TVL for real-world asset ([RWA](https://cointelegraph.com/learn/tokenized-real-world-assets-rwa-in-defi)) protocols had spiked to almost $8 billion as of April 26.
The analytics firm shared that RWA protocols had witnessed ‚Äúa remarkable resurgence,‚Äù over the past year, adding that the sector‚Äôs growth had been driven by a ‚Äúmarket preference for debt-based, high-yield investments.‚Äù
The $8 billion TVL figure excludes fiat-backed stablecoins such as Tether ([USDT](https://cointelegraph.com/tether-price-index)) and USD Coin ([USDC](https://cointelegraph.com/usdc-price-index)) and includes carry trade protocols, underwriting, yield-bearing stablecoins, commodities, securities, and real estate tokenization protocols.
Since February, the TVL in RWA protocols has surged by almost 60%.
![Image 2](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2024-05/3e4a5ef8-369d-438a-acca-65da2f64e644.jpg)
_RWA protocol TVL has grown 60% since February. Source: Messari_
Decentralized finance analytics platform DeFiLlama provided a slightly lower figure of $6 billion in combined TVL for RWA protocols. It also [shows](https://defillama.com/protocols/RWA) a monumental growth of around 700% in protocol TVL since the beginning of 2023.
Notably, the total value locked is not the only metric that has experienced impressive growth this year.
The number of active users on RWA protocols has also surged since February ‚Äî denoting an increase in the sector's popularity among smaller retail users, [per](https://dune.com/cryptokoryo/rwa) Dune Analytics data.
**_Related:_** [**_Gold, real estate and more: Legal infrastructure for real-world asset tokenization industry_**](https://cointelegraph.com/news/gold-real-estate-and-more-legal-infrastructure-for-real-world-asset-tokenization-industry)
Protocols such as digital carbon market platforms Toucan and KlimaDAO, and real estate tokenization protocol Propy have seen the lion‚Äôs share of that growth in terms of active users.¬†
![Image 3: a bar chart showing the number of ad spend in dune](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2024-05/1bdb5a39-646e-4818-b2ae-30d5bdb3b9ee.jpg)
_Carbon markets and real estate have seen the most user growth in the RWA sector: Source: Dune Analytics_
Tokenized Treasuries have also seen huge growth as yields remain high in an environment of high inflation and interest rates in the United States.
There is currently a record $1.29 billion locked in tokenized U.S. treasuries and bonds, [according](https://app.rwa.xyz/treasuries) to RWA.xyz.¬†This figure has surged by 80% since the beginning of 2024, primarily driven by protocols such as Securitize and Ondo.
The recent performance of BlackRock‚Äôs Ethereum-based Institutional Digital Liquidity Fund (BUIDL) ‚Äî which has [just become](https://cointelegraph.com/news/blackrocks-buidl-becomes-worlds-largest-tokenized-treasury-fund) the world‚Äôs largest tokenized treasury fund ‚Äî and the Franklin OnChain U.S. Government Money Fund (FOBXX) have contributed heavily to the growth of this corner of the RWA market.
**_Magazine:_** [**_7 ICO alternatives for blockchain fundraising: Crypto airdrops, IDOs & more_**](https://cointelegraph.com/magazine/blockchain-fundraising-airdrops-presales-ico-alternatives/)

item.title: News Article 23
item.description:
Title: Fantom bets on ‚Äòsafer memecoins‚Äô with launch of $6.5M dev fund
URL Source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/fantom-memecoins-wants-safer-tokens-launches-developer-fund
Published Time: 2024-05-01T03:28:52.000Z
Markdown Content: Fantom Foundation CEO Michael Kong hopes the blockchain can ‚Äúreplicate the success‚Äù of its peers by getting in on the memecoin hype.
1162 Total views
11 Total shares
![Image 1: Fantom bets on ‚Äòsafer memecoins‚Äô with launch of $6.5M dev fund](https://images.cointelegraph.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=90,width=1434/https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2024-05/4784e5c5-f83c-4f19-b5f4-78d047d7cfdd.jpg)
Own this piece of crypto history
[Collect this article as NFT](https://mint.cointelegraph.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcointelegraph.com%2Fnews%2Ffantom-memecoins-wants-safer-tokens-launches-developer-fund&utm_source=cointelegraph_com&utm_medium=button&utm_campaign=articles)
Layer-1 blockchain Fantom is pushing the idea of ‚Äúsafer memecoins‚Äù by setting aside $6.5 million worth of its native FTM ([FTM](https://cointelegraph.com/fantom-ftm-price-index)) token as a reward to devs as it tries to get a slice of the nearly $50 billion sector.
Fantom Foundation CEO Michael Kong told Cointelegraph he wants to create "an environment where people can launch what we call ‚Äòsafer memecoins‚Äô‚Äù and introduce technical and non-technical measures to ensure projects aren‚Äôt ‚Äújust an outright rug or scam.‚Äù
Solana and Coinbase‚Äôs Ethereum layer 2 Base have [seen the bulk](https://cointelegraph.com/news/trader-earns-23-million-profit-solana-memecoin-trading) of the recent memecoin trading craze with trading volumes on Solana even [surpassing Ethereum‚Äôs](https://cointelegraph.com/news/solana-activity-flips-ethereum-memecoin-frenzy) at the peak of the memecoin rush in March.
However, as many as [one in six of memecoins](https://cointelegraph.com/magazine/base-meme-coins-scams-vulnerabilities-honeypot/) on Base were revealed to be scams and at least 12 sizeable meme-based projects on Solana ‚Äî which raised a combined $26.7 million ‚Äî were [quickly abandoned](https://cointelegraph.com/news/12-solana-presale-memecoins-abandoned-after-one-month) by their creators.
In a bid to attract memecoin traders to Fantom as well as increasing safety measures around the tokens, Kong announced during the April 30 MemeGlobal event in Sydney that the Fantom Foundation was setting up a 10 million Fantom ([FTM](https://cointelegraph.com/fantom-ftm-price-index)) prize pool ‚Äî worth $6.5 million ‚Äî to memecoin teams.
‚ÄúThe memecoin phenomenon that exists right now is a method for us to acquire a lot of customers because we‚Äôve seen that be successful with other chains and we want to replicate that success,‚Äù Kong said.
‚ÄúFor us as a chain, our interest is to grow the chain as much as possible and that comes down to customer acquisition,‚Äù Kong added.
> ‚ÄúIn the end, it‚Äôs about what the customer wants. If the customer wants DeFi, give them DeFi. NFTs? Give them NFTs, and when it comes to memecoins, give them memecoins ‚Äî or at least an environment that allows people to develop memecoins in a safe manner.‚Äù
Kong described a successful memecoin as one with a ‚Äúdemocratic launch where you release a lot of tokens to give to the community‚Äù and aren‚Äôt ‚Äúheavily concentrated in a few whales or a few bags.‚Äù
![Image 2](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2024-05/f82ab52e-e07c-4ad3-bb30-c897b827a68d.jpg)
_Michael Kong speaking on a panel at MemeGlobal Sydney. Source: Jesse Coghlan/Cointelegraph_
The Foundation‚Äôs co-founder Andre Cronje [proposed](https://andrecronje.medium.com/safer-community-meme-coins-9cda6f882c59) measures for safe memecoins earlier in April including memecoin devs issuing their token with the Fanton Foundation as a co-controller of the token‚Äôs startup liquidity.
**_Related:_** [**_Crypto VC sees a ‚Äònew class‚Äô of profitable memecoins this cycle_**](https://cointelegraph.com/news/new-profitable-memecoins-crypto-vc-founder-dogecoin-politics)
Cronje also proposed the token supply split ‚Äî 5% to the team and 10% for marketing that‚Äôs locked in a multi-sig wallet needing at least one Foundation member as a co-signer.
The remaining 85% would be placed in an FTM paired [liquidity pool](https://cointelegraph.com/explained/defi-liquidity-pools-explained) (LP) with the Foundation pitching in 100,000 FTM ‚Äî worth around $65,000 at current prices.
‚ÄúShould the FTM in the LP token reach at least 2,000,000 FTM, the original provided 100,000 FTM (5%) will be removed to cover the initial cost and the rest of the LP will be burned,‚Äù Cronje wrote.
Fantom is the 38th largest blockchain network with a total value locked (TVL) of $108.3 million, [according](https://defillama.com/chains) to DefiLlama. For comparison, Solana and Base are respectively the fourth and sixth largest by TVL.
**_Magazine:_** [**_1 in 6 new Base meme coins are scams, 91% have vulnerabilities_**](https://cointelegraph.com/magazine/base-meme-coins-scams-vulnerabilities-honeypot/)

item.title: News Article 24
item.description:
Title: ‚ÄòPretty ordinary stuff‚Äô ‚Äî Traders seem unfazed by Bitcoin correction
URL Source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/bitcoin-price-correction-crypto-traders-indicators
Published Time: 2024-05-01T03:08:08.000Z
Markdown Content: Bitcoin¬†has declined approximately 20% over the past three months, but crypto traders are unfazed, claiming it is just a routine correction in the market cycle.
‚ÄúThis is the 4th 20% correction in BTC in 12 months...pretty ordinary stuff,‚Äù the CEO of Real Vision, Raoul Pal, stated in an April 30 [post](https://twitter.com/raoulgmi/status/1785328306247569450?s=46&t=MuRujqZUAz3TQE1vmr3c6A) on X ‚Äî comparing its current price level to when Bitcoin ([BTC](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-price)) hit its all-time high of $75,830 on March 14.
‚ÄúThis is exactly what the cycle needs to resynchronize with historical price norms and the traditional Halving Cycle,‚Äù pseudonymous crypto trader Rekt Capital wrote in a [post](https://twitter.com/rektcapital/status/1785370455706063233) on the same day.
‚ÄúPrice might fall to $40K, but it might rise to $400K. That‚Äôs just how it is, and it‚Äôs a great bet,‚Äù [added](https://x.com/thomas_fahrer/status/1785450839815147634) Thomas Fahrer, the CEO of crypto-focused reviews portal Apollo.
At the time of publication, Bitcoin is trading at $59,730 after falling 6% over the past 24 hours, [according](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bitcoin/) to CoinMarketCap data.
![Image 1](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2024-05/a4c17fec-2214-4f89-87ba-2a1812c25152.png)
_Over the past 30 days, Bitcoin‚Äôs price has dropped 15.98%. Source: CoinMarketCap_
Bitcoin had a brief stint below support levels, trading at $59,097, which resulted in the liquidation of $96.5 million in long positions, [according](https://www.coinglass.com/LiquidationData) to CoinGlass data.
Bitcoin‚Äôs price is ‚Äúgetting closer and closer to its final bottom with each additional -1% to the downside,‚Äù commented Rekt in a separate X [post](https://x.com/rektcapital/status/1785396823558868998) on the same day.
Ben Simpson, the CEO of Collective Shift, told Cointelegraph that he thinks the market may now be in a ‚Äúlull period‚Äù after the recent Bitcoin halving due to a lack of new narratives for traders.
However, he remains optimistic about the market‚Äôs long-term prospects beyond the next few months.
> ‚ÄúI believe in the next month or two we are going to see some choppiness sideways, and a continued drawdown, especially when we still have macro uncertainty, we have the rate Fed decision, the ongoing war, there is a lot of uncertainty in the market.‚Äù
Other traders have also pointed to bullish indicators forming on Bitcoin‚Äôs price chart which could signal a breakout in the next few months.
Crypto trader Gally Sama pointed out the forming cup-and-handle pattern on Bitcoin‚Äôs price chart ‚Äî when the price falls and then rebounds in a u-shaped recovery, which looks like a cup ‚Äî stating that the handle is forming ‚Äúaround or above the previous highs.‚Äù
![Image 2](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2024-05/74d8f558-4cdf-485b-9490-854155d05678.png)
_Source: [Gally Sama](https://twitter.com/hdcharting/status/1785460991427252440)_
The overall crypto market also faced widespread corrections alongside Bitcoin, with Ether ([ETH](https://cointelegraph.com/ethereum-price)) falling by 7.4%, Solana‚Äôs ([SOL](https://cointelegraph.com/solana-price-index)) dropping by¬†10.1% and Dogecoin ([DOGE](https://cointelegraph.com/doge-price-index)) falling by 10.1%.
**_Related:_** [**_Coinbase integrates Lightning Network for Bitcoin transactions_**](https://cointelegraph.com/news/coinbase-integrates-lightning-network-bitcoin-transactions)
The market decline has led to a drop in overall investor confidence over the past 24 hours, [according](https://alternative.me/crypto/fear-and-greed-index/) to the Fear and Greed Index.
On May 1, the index score fell to a ‚Äúneutral‚Äù 54 ‚Äî the lowest it has been in three months ‚Äî dropping 13 points from April 30 ‚Äúgreed‚Äù score of 67.
**_Magazine:_** [**_Gordon Goner on his dramatic health battles and Bored Apes turning 3_**](https://cointelegraph.com/magazine/gordon-goner-health-battle-bored-apes-turn-3/)
This article does not contain investment advice or recommendations. Every investment and trading move involves risk, and readers should conduct their own research when making a decision.

item.description:
Title: Is Bitcoin Heading For A Dip Ahead Of FOMC? Analyst Predicts Potential 'Cascade Towards $55-58K' Before R
URL Source: https://www.benzinga.com/analyst-ratings/analyst-color/24/04/38540161/is-bitcoin-heading-for-a-dip-ahead-of-fomc-analyst-predicts-potential-cascade-towar
Published Time: 2024-04-30T23:04:55.000-04:00
Markdown Content: As the cryptocurrency market braces for the upcoming Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting, a prominent crypto analyst has made a bold prediction about **Bitcoin**‚Äòs BTC/USD immediate future.
**What Happened**: **Micah√´l van de Poppe**, a well-known crypto analyst, took to social media platform X to share his forecast for Bitcoin‚Äôs immediate future. Van de Poppe anticipates a potential dip in the price of Bitcoin, with a possible range of $55,000 to $58,000 before a rebound.
Van de Poppe‚Äôs post read, ‚ÄúMonthly close approaching for #Bitcoin and FOMC day tomorrow. I think we‚Äôll see that sweep beneath $60K and potentially cascade towards $55-58K from which we‚Äôre finding the low and rotate back upwards. From there: **Ethereum** ETH/USD ETF hype in May to pick up momentum.‚Äù
This prediction comes at a time when the market is experiencing a ‚Äú[horrendous slow bleed](https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/24/04/38528542/bitcoin-dogecoin-shiba-inu-pumped-after-the-last-fomc-meeting-will-history-repeat-on-wedne),‚Äù with most cryptocurrencies closing in the red for 15 out of the last 20 days, according to pseudonymous cryptocurrency trader **Kevin**.
_See Also: [Shiba Inu‚Äôs Burn Rate Soars, Cathie Wood Believes Ethereum Could Catch Up To Bitcoin And More: Top Crypto](https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/24/04/38478293/shiba-inus-burn-rate-soars-cathie-wood-believes-ethereum-could-catch-up-to-bitcoin-and-mor?itm_source=parsely-api)_
**Why It Matters**: The upcoming FOMC meeting is expected to have a significant impact on the cryptocurrency market. Kevin, in a recent tweet, emphasized the [importance of the meeting](https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/24/04/38528542/bitcoin-dogecoin-shiba-inu-pumped-after-the-last-fomc-meeting-will-history-repeat-on-wedne) as a potential catalyst for the next significant market move.
Van de Poppe‚Äôs prediction also aligns with his previous insights on market rotations and [altcoin seasons](https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/24/04/38523300/crypto-trader-michael-van-de-poppe-highlights-runs-in-solana-meme-coins-predicts-there-is-). He believes that by identifying opportunities in altcoins and strategically rotating profits back into Bitcoin, investors can outperform the market and maintain their purchasing power in the face of inflation.
However, the market has also [seen some turbulence](https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/24/04/38535711/bitcoin-jesus-roger-ver-arrested-in-spain-on-tax-evasion-charges) with the recent arrest of **Roger Ver**, a prominent figure in the early days of Bitcoin, in Spain on tax evasion charges.
**Price Action**: Bitcoin is currently trading at $59,730, experiencing a 1.47% decline over the last 24 hours but showing a remarkable 35.22% increase year-to-date. Meanwhile, Ether is trading at $2,977, down 1.13% in the past 24 hours, yet still reflecting a solid 26.54% gain year-to-date, according to data [from Benzinga Pro](https://pro.benzinga.com/dashboard).
_Read Next: [Bitcoin Faces Potential Downturn As Analysts Eye ‚ÄòSecond Danger Zone‚Äô ‚Äî But What Happened To ‚ÄòMemecoin Supercycle?‚Äô](https://www.benzinga.com/analyst-ratings/analyst-color/24/04/38480709/bitcoin-faces-potential-downturn-as-analysts-eye-second-danger-zone-but-what-happen?itm_source=parsely-api)_

item.title: News Article 26
item.description:
Title: Uniswap DEX Captures 37% of Ethereum L2 Volume
URL Source: https://cryptopotato.com/uniswap-dex-captures-37-of-ethereum-l2-volume/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T04:15:35+00:00
Markdown Content: Uniswap, the most widely used Layer 2 decentralized exchanges (DEXs) built on Ethereum, now accounts for approximately 37% of the total trading volume on L2.
This represents a remarkable increase compared to the trading volumes observed two years ago.
Uniswap L2 Volumes Surged Over 650% -----------------------------------
In a post on X, Tom Wan, a researcher at 21.co, noted the growth of Uniswap‚Äôs layer 2 (L2) volume, which has surged by more than 650% over the past 24 months. This increase saw its volume climb from approximately $4 billion in 2022 to over $30 billion this year.
> .[@Uniswap](https://twitter.com/Uniswap?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)‚Äòs trading volume is growing on L2s and currently contributes to 37% of the total volume > > Since 2022, Uniswap‚Äôs volume on L2s has grown from $4B to $30B (+650%). Uniswap‚Äôs L2s volume in 2022 only contributes to 5.2% of the total volume > > L2s have been gaining more‚Ä¶ [pic.twitter.com/PR7GT9xdih](https://t.co/PR7GT9xdih) > > ‚Äî Tom Wan (@tomwanhh) [April 29, 2024](https://twitter.com/tomwanhh/status/1784929074122539111?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
Wan suggested that this trend could continue to strengthen, especially with the launch of more quality protocols on [Layer 2 networks](https://cryptopotato.com/ethereums-layer-2-networks-projected-to-reach-1t-market-cap-by-2030-vaneck-analysts/) such as Arbitrum, Coinbase‚Äôs Base, and Optimism.
[![Image 1: blockdrop unlocking bitcoin mining for everyone claim your airdrop](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4150113)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=183000&plid=2399417&setID=631314&channelID=0&CID=880818&banID=521892882&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2317939&adSize=300x250&mt=1714546192125522&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fcryptopotato.com%2Funiswap-dex-captures-37-of-ethereum-l2-volume%2F&hc=033b8e9dd46aea5fa52e4cbffcaeed5bc29d437a&location=)
According to Wan, L2s, notably Base and Arbitrum, have witnessed a surge in economic activities, accounting for 82% of the total L2 volume on Uniswap. Wan anticipates that the dominance of L2 volume on Uniswap will likely grow to 50% by the end of the year.
Although Uniswap has contributed only 2.9% of the total volume on altcoin layer 1s, Wan believes this narrative could evolve. He explained that high-performance Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM)-compatible layer 1s, combined with a multichain expansion strategy, could enable the DEX to capture more volume on networks like Sei and Monad.
Uniswap, the first decentralized exchange on Ethereum, continues to [maintain](https://cryptopotato.com/5-years-later-uniswap-surpasses-2-trillion-milestone-in-trading-volume/) its position as the largest on-chain trading venue on the Ethereum Layer 1 blockchain. The protocol has facilitated over $2 trillion in cumulative trading volume across 17 chains. According to DefiLlama [data](https://defillama.com/protocol/uniswap#information), users have deposited more than $5.5 billion in total value-locked on Uniswap.
Uniswap Faces SEC Regulatory Pressure -------------------------------------
Uniswap, amid its ongoing success, is [facing](https://cryptopotato.com/bitcoins-wild-ride-around-70k-uniswap-v-sec-clash-in-the-making-and-more-this-weeks-crypto-recap/) regulatory pressure from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) as part of a broader regulatory crackdown on the crypto-exchange market.
The SEC has issued a Wells Notice to Uniswap, indicating a probable enforcement action. Despite this development, Uniswap intends to defend itself against what it considers a ‚Äúdisappointing but not surprising‚Äù decision.
This lawsuit comes amid widespread criticism from the crypto industry regarding the SEC‚Äôs approach. Many argue that the SEC has been operating in bad faith. Critics contend that the SEC has pursued enforcement actions without considering the unique characteristics of blockchain-based technology in the crypto sector.
In response, SEC Chairman Gary Gensler has [defended](https://cryptopotato.com/sec-files-notice-of-intent-to-sue-uniswap-labs/) the SEC‚Äôs actions, asserting that existing securities laws are clear and that the crypto sector has sought special treatment while failing to comply.
Meanwhile, UNI is trading at $7.68, up 0.9% in the last 24 hours but down 6% over the last week.

item.description:
Title: Hong Kong Spot Crypto ETFs Had a Mixed Debut, Experts Weigh In
URL Source: https://beincrypto.com/hong-kong-spot-crypto-etfs-debut-performance/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T03:53:33+00:00
Markdown Content: **On April 30, 2024, Hong Kong entered into spot cryptocurrency exchange-traded funds (ETFs) with a mix of excitement and prudence. The Hong Kong Stock Exchange (HKEX) launched six new spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs.**
These ETFs, issued by China Asset Management, Bosera HashKey, and Harvest International, are a remarkable achievement for Asia‚Äôs crypto market. However, the first trading day was relatively muted compared to its US counterparts.
A Mixed Bag for Hong Kong‚Äôs Spot Crypto ETFs --------------------------------------------
A local media outlet [reported](https://baijiahao.baidu.com/s?id=1797754125241872006&wfr=spider&for=pc) the initial launch size of ChinaAMC Bitcoin ETF (CAM BTC) and ChinaAMC Ether ETF (CAM ETH) were HKD 950 million and HKD 160 million, respectively. Furthermore, data from Bloomberg Intelligence revealed that CAM BTC ETF recorded $123.61 million in total assets.
These numbers showcase CAM BTC‚Äôs position as the day‚Äôs largest launch, with an increase of 1.53% in its closing price. Conversely, CAM ETH dipped by 0.78%.
**Read more: [How To Trade a Bitcoin ETF: A Step-by-Step Approach](https://beincrypto.com/learn/how-to-prepare-bitcoin-etf/)**
![Image 1: ChinaAMC Bitcoin ETF (CAM BTC) Trading Data.](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
ChinaAMC Bitcoin ETF (CAM BTC) Trading Data. Source: [X/EricBalchunas](https://twitter.com/EricBalchunas/status/1785324704179368374)
Sponsored
[![Image 2: chimpzee - screenshot](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4141915)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=177750&plid=2393816&setID=654215&channelID=0&CID=879121&banID=521874692&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2312363&adSize=300x600&data_keys=%7B%22product%22%3A%22news%22%2C%22domain%22%3A%22com.beincrypto.com%22%7D&mt=1714546217318432&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbeincrypto.com%2Fhong-kong-spot-crypto-etfs-debut-performance%2F&hc=966b4320c29eedb23f7f15cac58f36b52b545177&location=)
[![Image 3: a man in a top hat and a top hat is wearing a top hat](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4154394)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=177750&plid=2405485&setID=722596&channelID=0&CID=878459&banID=521899529&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2323988&adSize=745x180&data_keys=%7B%22product%22%3A%22news%22%2C%22domain%22%3A%22com.beincrypto.com%22%7D&mt=1714546217399463&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbeincrypto.com%2Fhong-kong-spot-crypto-etfs-debut-performance%2F&hc=5d2f63bad13a86e1dfe8dcf3d3026b23c618f480&location=)
Sponsored
Similarly, Bosera Hashkey and Harvest International experienced a mix of slight gains and modest losses across their respective ETF offerings.
The Bosera Hashkey Bitcoin ETF appreciated by 1.80%, while its Ethereum ETF fell by 0.45%. Meanwhile, Harvest Bitcoin Spot ETF (HGI BTC) and Harvest Ether Spot ETF (HGI ETH) observed upticks of 1.57% and downticks of 0.73%, respectively.
Data from Arkham Intelligence [showed](https://platform.arkhamintelligence.com/explorer/entity/bosera-funds) that Bosera Hashkey‚Äôs ETFs hold approximately $70.34 million of assets. These assets comprise 964 Bitcoin (~$57.55 million) and 4,290 Ethereum (~$12.80 million).
These outcomes suggest a higher appeal for [Hong Kong‚Äôs spot Bitcoin ETFs](https://beincrypto.com/bitcoin-etfs-gold-rival/) than Ethereum variants on the first trading day.
The [Hong Kong ETF issuers](https://beincrypto.com/hong-kong-spot-bitcoin-etfs-trading-hkex/) have adopted diverse strategies in management fees to stand out in the competitive market. For instance, Harvest International has notably set a low management fee of 0.3% for its ETFs, a rate that is waived for the first six months post-listing.
In contrast, ChinaAMC has opted for a standard fee of 0.99%. They also implement different issue prices and trading conditions for their customers.
Undeniably, these ETFs have enriched the product offerings in Hong Kong‚Äôs stock market. They also opened up new avenues for professional and retail investors. BeInCrypto reported that these ETFs are available in multiple currencies, including Hong Kong dollars (HKD), US dollars, and Renminbi (RMB).
Sponsored
[![Image 4: chimpzee - win up to $ 1000 in nft prizes](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4141909)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=177750&plid=2393807&setID=460554&channelID=0&CID=879118&banID=521874686&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2312354&adSize=300x250&data_keys=%7B%22product%22%3A%22news%22%2C%22domain%22%3A%22com.beincrypto.com%22%7D&mt=1714546217430057&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbeincrypto.com%2Fhong-kong-spot-crypto-etfs-debut-performance%2F&hc=de90a6e0c06b9e634bbbf01a6b9c6754c1b0f27e&location=)
[![Image 5](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4150151)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=177750&plid=2400310&setID=722596&channelID=0&CID=881044&banID=521887846&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2318832&adSize=745x180&data_keys=%7B%22product%22%3A%22news%22%2C%22domain%22%3A%22com.beincrypto.com%22%7D&mt=1714546217400204&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbeincrypto.com%2Fhong-kong-spot-crypto-etfs-debut-performance%2F&hc=e659e4bf3dd94c85d7de5964f5b37006d5a59662&location=)
Sponsored
Moreover, the ETFs are also available to international investors who meet local compliance standards. Yet, [mainland Chinese investors](https://beincrypto.com/china-crypto-ban-hong-kong-bitcoin-etf/) currently face barriers to accessing Hong Kong‚Äôs spot crypto ETFs.
The Long-Term Game: Experts Weigh In ------------------------------------
Although listing spot ETFs presents a notable step forward for [Hong Kong‚Äôs position as a crypto hub](https://beincrypto.com/hong-kong-singapore-battle-crypto-hub/), market observers offer mixed assessments. Guillermo Fernandes, founder and CEO of Blockpliance, shared his perspectives.
> ‚ÄúHong Kong has long served as the financial capital of Asia ‚Ä¶ For this reason, launching crypto ETFs in that market is not something that should be taken lightly, especially because they‚Äôve approved Ethereum ETFs before the US was able to do so. Having said that, the US continues to be the largest financial market in the world, so it is natural that most of the large institution investors who wanted to add Bitcoin exposure to their portfolios have chosen to do it via the US market instead of Hong Kong,‚Äù Fernandes explained to BeInCrypto.
Sponsored
[![Image 6](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4129173)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=177750&plid=2380719&setID=664122&channelID=0&CID=875284&banID=521850476&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2299286&adSize=300x600&data_keys=%7B%22product%22%3A%22news%22%2C%22domain%22%3A%22com.beincrypto.com%22%7D&mt=1714546217426875&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbeincrypto.com%2Fhong-kong-spot-crypto-etfs-debut-performance%2F&hc=377f0edb414028b30a293379e810fd326b34f0a3&location=)
[![Image 7: this will be the biggest token launch of 2024](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4153773)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=177750&plid=2404753&setID=722596&channelID=0&CID=848604&banID=521898580&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2323214&adSize=745x180&data_keys=%7B%22product%22%3A%22news%22%2C%22domain%22%3A%22com.beincrypto.com%22%7D&mt=1714546217399769&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbeincrypto.com%2Fhong-kong-spot-crypto-etfs-debut-performance%2F&hc=86b8f071b9933d47a9d695026d9e957982925c1e&location=)
Sponsored
**Read more: [Crypto ETN vs. Crypto ETF: What Is the Difference?](https://beincrypto.com/learn/crypto-etn-vs-crypto-etf/)**
Although the first day‚Äôs trading was somewhat subdued, these spot ETFs offer a promising new avenue for investors in Hong Kong and potentially the broader Asia-Pacific region to engage with cryptocurrency markets.
Eric Balchunas, senior ETF analyst at Bloomberg Intelligence, [advised](https://twitter.com/EricBalchunas/status/1785324704179368374) tempering expectations about Hong Kong‚Äôs spot crypto ETFs. However, he believes that the numbers are impressive on a local scale.
Additionally, it is expected that investors from mainland China will try to find ways around local restrictions to take advantage of investment opportunities. Fernandes highlighted that Hong Kong is a popular destination for Chinese investors as it offers simpler Know Your Customer (KYC) processes and the convenience of similar time zones and points of contact. These factors are considered an advantage compared to the [more stringent scrutiny faced in the US](https://beincrypto.com/sec-bitcoin-etf-options-ethereum-etf/).

item.description:
Title: Binance Founder CZ Receives Light Four-Month Sentence for Financial Misconduct
URL Source: https://coinpaprika.com/news/binance-founder-cz-receives-light-four-month-sentence-for-financial-misconduct/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T05:51:34+00:00
Markdown Content: By [Jakub Lazurek](https://coinpaprika.com/news/authors/jakub-lazurek)
01 May 2024
2 min read
Binance's CZ gets four months in prison for anti-money laundering failures --------------------------------------------------------------------------
**Former** [**Binance CEO**](https://coinpaprika.com/news/doj-demands-3-year-sentence-for-binance-ceo/) **Changpeng Zhao, or CZ, will serve a four-month prison term** for failing to implement adequate anti-money laundering controls at the cryptocurrency exchange.
This sentence, issued in Seattle, is much lighter than the three-year term prosecutors had requested for what they considered a severe violation of the Bank Secrecy Act (BSA).
During the sentencing hearing, **Judge Richard Jones noted CZ's background as a philanthropist and first-time lawbreaker**, significantly influencing his decision.
Before the hearing, Judge Jones reviewed numerous letters portraying CZ positively, emphasizing his charitable efforts and personal integrity.
CZ becomes **the first CEO imprisoned under the BSA**, signaling the gravity of Binance's oversight in anti-money laundering practices.
Despite his contributions to global charity, prosecutors argued that these actions do not excuse legal violations, a point the defense contested by highlighting his voluntary surrender and cooperation.
Judge Jones acknowledged the overwhelming support for CZ, which was evident from the many letters he received describing him as a compassionate yet flawed individual.
**CZ's defense stressed his clean legal history and proactive engagement with the legal process**, including his decision to face charges despite living in a non-extradition country.
**The judge clarified that CZ's role at** [**Binance**](https://coinpaprika.com/news/binance-stops-listing-monero-and-others/) **did not exempt him from following the law**, pointing out that his wealth and status do not place him above legal responsibilities.
Despite the prison term, CZ plans to continue his philanthropic work, particularly his global education initiative for children.
This indicates that this setback is likely only a brief interruption in his career.
[Go back to All News](https://coinpaprika.com/news)

item.title: News Article 30
item.description:
Title: Shiba Inu's latest price projections - Here's the move you should make
URL Source: https://ambcrypto.com/shiba-inu-this-indicates-price-rise-what-moves-should-you-make/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T05:00:40+00:00
Markdown Content: ![Image 1: Shiba Inu: THIS indicates price rise - What moves should you make?](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201200%20686'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
* _Exchange data suggested that SHIB‚Äôs price might rise to $0.000026 in a few weeks._ * _The low NVT ratio indicated that the token remained undervalued._
The number of [Shiba Inu \[SHIB\]](https://ambcrypto.com/category/shiba-inu-news/) tokens on exchanges has been decreasing since the last days of March, AMBCrypto found.
Using Glassnode‚Äôs provided Exchange Balance total, we noticed that the metric was 146.67 trillion before April began.
However, press time data [showed](https://studio.glassnode.com/metrics?a=SHIB&category=Distribution&m=distribution.BalanceExchanges&s=1698746371&u=1714471171&zoom=182) that the Exchange Balance was 140.66 trillion, meaning that about 6 trillion SHIB have left these platforms.
#### Calm is coming
Typically, these withdrawals were supposed to cushion the effect of selling pressure. However, that was not the situation. In the last 30 days, SHIB lost 25.34% of its value, but the decline was widespread in the market.
However, if the balance on exchange continues to drop, there is a high chance for Shiba Inu to recover.
While that might not happen in the next few days, traders might need to keep an eye on the broader market sentiment in May.
[![Image 2: Shiba Inu's low NVT ratio shows a bullish sign](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201800%201013'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://ambcrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/shiba-inu-price-and-exchange-balance.png)
Source: Glassnode
Should the sentiment tilt bullish, then the price of SHIB might surpass $0.000026 for a start. When we examined the difference in exchange inflow and outflow, it gave a [similar sign](https://app.santiment.net/charts/CjaKV0cB__sCl).
According to AMBCrypto‚Äôs analysis of Santiment, Shiba Inu‚Äôs exchange inflow was 200.27 million. This metric is the number of tokens sent into exchanges.
If it increases, it increases the chances of a price [decline](https://ambcrypto.com/will-shiba-inu-fall-to-bears-analyzing-whats-ahead-for-shib/). If the exchange inflow drops, then the opposite happens.
The exchange outflow, at the opposite end, was 683.91 million. With the Shiba Inu inflow 3x less than the outflow, it is expected that SHIB might face less selling pressure in the days to come.
[![Image 3: SHIB's decreasing exchange inflow](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%202560%20867'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://ambcrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/shib-exchange-inflow-and-outflow.png)
Source: Santiment
#### SHIB aims to hit $0.000040
Another metric AMBCrypto decided to examine was the NVT Ratio. NVT is an acronym for Network Value Transaction. This metric divides the market cap of a project by the on-chain volume transferred.
If the result of this division gives a high ratio, it means investors are paying a premium for a token. In this case, we can say that the price could be overvalued relative to the market condition.
On the other hand, a low NVT ratio signals [undervaluation](https://studio.glassnode.com/metrics?a=SHIB&category=&m=indicators.Nvt&s=1706704015&u=1714480015&zoom=90). At press time, Shiba Inu‚Äôs NVT Ratio was down to 107.72, indicating that the price might increase.
[![Image 4: Shiba Inu's low NVT ratio shows a bullish sign](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201800%201013'%3E%3C/svg%3E)](https://ambcrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/shiba-inu-nvt-ratio.png)
Sources: Glassnode
However, the metric can decrease from this point. If that is the case, SHIB‚Äôs [projected rebound](https://ambcrypto.com/shiba-inu-price-prediction-all-about-shibs-latest-buy-opportunity/) could be harder.
In February, when the NVT Ratio was 45.48, the price of the token climbed from $0.000010 and hit $0.000035 by the first week in March.
* * *
Read [Shiba Inu‚Äôs \[SHIB\] Price Prediction](https://ambcrypto.com/predictions/shiba-inu-price-prediction) 2024-2025
* * *
Taking the event into consideration, SHIB might try to replicate the performance. If validated, the price of the cryptocurrency might rally past $0.000040.
In the long-term, this potential rise could be better, as SHIB might aim to delete one zero again.

Title: DOT Price (Polkadot) Approaches Key Level: Should Traders Brace for Sharp Drop?
URL Source: https://www.newsbtc.com/analysis/dot/dot-price-polkadot-sharp-drop-5/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T04:58:17Z

_Polkadot (DOT) is showing bearish signs below the $8 resistance against the US Dollar. The price could extend its decline if it fails to stay above $6.00._
* DOT is gaining pace below the $8.80 and $8.00 levels against the US Dollar. * The price is trading below the $7.20 zone and the 100 simple moving average (4 hours). * There is a key bearish trend line forming with resistance at $6.50 on the 4-hour chart of the DOT/USD pair (data source from Kraken). * The pair could continue to decline toward the $5.00 support zone.
Polkadot Price Resumes Drop ---------------------------
After a steady increase, DOT price faced resistance near the $7.60 zone. It formed a short-term top and started a fresh decline below the $7.00 level, like [Ethereum](https://www.newsbtc.com/analysis/eth/ethereum-price-plunges-2800/) and [Bitcoin](https://www.newsbtc.com/analysis/btc/bitcoin-price-nosedives-60k/).
There was a move below the $6.20 support zone. A low was formed near $6.03 and the price is now consolidating losses. It is slowly moving higher above the $6.35 level and the 23.6% Fib retracement level of the downward move from the $7.58 swing high to the $6.03 low.
![Image 2](https://servedbyadbutler.com/error/blank.gif)

DOT is now trading below the $7.00 zone and the 100 simple moving average (4 hours). Immediate resistance is near the $6.50 level. There is also a key bearish trend line forming with resistance at $6.50 on the 4-hour chart of the DOT/USD pair.
[![Image 4: DOT Price (Polkadot)](https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Polkadot-DOT.png?resize=1024%2C461)](https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Polkadot-DOT.png?resize=1024%2C461)

The next major resistance is near $7.00 or the 61.8% Fib retracement level of the downward move from the $7.58 swing high to the $6.03 low. A successful break above $7.00 could start another strong rally. In the stated case, the price could easily rally toward $8.20 in the near term. The next major resistance is seen near the $10.00 zone.
More Downsides in DOT? ----------------------
If DOT price fails to start a fresh increase above $7.00, it could continue to move down. The first key support is near the $6.00 level.
The next major support is near the $5.65 level, below which the price might decline to $5.00. Any more losses may perhaps open the doors for a move toward the $4.20 support zone or the trend line.

Technical Indicators

4-Hours RSI (Relative Strength Index) ‚Äì The RSI for DOT/USD is now below the 50 level.
Major Support Levels ‚Äì $6.00, $5.65 and $5.00.
Major Resistance Levels ‚Äì $6.50, $7.00, and $8.50.

Aayush is a Senior Forex, Cryptocurrencies, and Financial Market Strategist. item.title: News Article 32
item.description:
Title: Lazarus Group Linked to $200 Million Crypto Laundering Scheme
URL Source: https://coinpaprika.com/news/lazarus-group-linked-to-200-million-crypto-laundering-scheme/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T05:51:15+00:00
Markdown Content: **According to blockchain investigator ZachXBT,** [**North Korea's**](https://coinpaprika.com/news/north-koreas-alleged-crypto-move-to-blackrock-creates-global-stir/) **Lazarus Group was implicated in laundering $200 million through cryptocurrency hacks** between August 2020 and October 2023.
The group utilized advanced laundering techniques like coin mixers and peer-to-peer exchanges.
ZZachXBT's report revealed that **the group masked the origins of stolen funds from over 25 breaches across various blockchain platforms**.
They predominantly used the [Ethereum](https://coinpaprika.com/news/ethereum-s-big-update-brings-price-close-to-2-400/) mixer Tornado Cash and the Bitcoin-based ChipMixer.
Moreover, [**Lazarus**](https://coinpaprika.com/news/35-million-atomic-wallet-hack-traced-to-north-korea-s-infamous-cyber-hacking-group-and-their-secret-crypto-mixer/) **converted substantial amounts of cryptocurrency into fiat currency via peer-to-peer platforms**, with linked accounts receiving $44 million.
Usernames "asyGoatfish351" and "airJunco470" were identified as part of these transactions.
The group is known for orchestrating some of the most **significant digital heists, with thefts totaling over $3 billion**.
The United Nations Security Council claims these funds support North Korea's weaponry initiatives, underscoring the broader security risks.

item.title: News Article 33
item.description:
Title: Matera Secures $3.6 Million to Connect DeFi and Social Media
URL Source: https://coinpaprika.com/news/matera-secures-3-6-million-to-connect-defi-and-social-media/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T05:51:02+00:00
Markdown Content: By [Jakub Lazurek](https://coinpaprika.com/news/authors/jakub-lazurek)
01 May 2024
2 min read
Matera raises $3.6M to merge DeFi with social media, aiming to grow the creator economy ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Web3 company **Matera has raised $3.6 million** to merge decentralized finance ([DeFi](https://coinpaprika.com/news/defi-platform-stops-operation/)) with current social media to boost the creator economy.
According to a CryptoSlate press release, this funding aims to solve the issue of making money within the creator economy and propel its worth to over $1 trillion by 2030.
Investors such as Sidedoor Ventures, HighCass Crypto, Medusa Ventures, The Sandbox, and Saxon Partners supported the funding round.
Matera aims to fuse DeFi with popular social media platforms, **transforming how creators earn money** and engage with their followers.
This method uses traditional platforms' existing user base and market reach while integrating Web3's innovative economic models, thus boosting the potential economic value of creator networks without replacing existing platforms.
Rather than starting anew, Matera will introduce DeFi solutions to improve these platforms.
A key innovation is the **Matera Credit Score**, which rates creators based on their interactions across various platforms. This score can be used to access funds and rewards within Matera‚Äôs system.
Matera‚Äôs CEO, Sam Huber, noted the challenge Web3 SocialFi faces due to the underestimated network effects of Web2 platforms.
He emphasized the **high costs for creators** to switch and start anew on different platforms, despite better financial terms.
Matera plans to bridge this gap, merging the reach of web2 with web3‚Äôs economics to address this issue.
The company expects its approach to **drastically grow the creator economy**, aiming to bring 100 million creators and their followers into the blockchain by 2030.
Matera is also developing a **robust blockchain infrastructure** that includes a DeFi platform, a protocol layer, and a layer-2 network for better scalability and efficiency.
Currently, Matera supports creators on X (formerly Twitter), helping them raise funds and monetize their fan base.
The company intends to expand these services to more social media platforms soon, widening its influence in the creator economy.
[Go back to All News](https://coinpaprika.com/news)

item.title: News Article 34
item.description:
Title: UK Authorities Granted Expanded Powers to Combat Crypto Crime, Including Asset Seizure Without Arrest
URL Source: https://www.cryptointelligence.co.uk/uk-authorities-granted-expanded-powers-to-combat-crypto-crime-including-asset-seizure-without-arrest/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T04:33:54+00:00
Markdown Content: The United Kingdom‚Äôs National Crime Agency ([NCA](https://www.nationalcrimeagency.gov.uk/)) and police have been granted expanded authority to deal with cryptocurrency used for illicit activities, including the power to ‚Äúseize, freeze, and destroy‚Äù such digital assets.
Under the new regulations, law enforcement in the UK will no longer need to make an arrest prior to confiscating crypto holdings.
Macro Taking 'Wind' Out of Crypto: Starkiller's Drogen
In a statement released by the UK Home Office, it was disclosed that police can now also seize materials such as passwords or memory sticks that could assist in ongoing investigations.
Additionally, UK law enforcement will have the capability to eliminate a crypto asset if reintroducing it into circulation is deemed harmful to the public interest.
Effective from April 26, the new laws authorize the police to transfer seized illicit cryptocurrency to wallets under their control, with provisions for crime victims to seek reimbursement from their crypto accounts.
UK Home Secretary James Cleverly emphasized the necessity of preventing criminals from profiting from illegal activities, citing the use of cryptocurrency fundraising by various groups as a key driver behind the introduction of these enhanced police powers.
Cleverly underscored the potential national security implications, citing instances where terrorist organizations like Daesh have been known to finance their operations through crypto transactions, highlighting the importance of enabling agencies to more effectively strip them of their assets.
**READ MORE: [Binance Founder CZ Faces 36-Month Jail Term as U.S. Prosecutors Urge Sentencing](https://www.cryptointelligence.co.uk/binance-founder-cz-faces-36-month-jail-term-as-u-s-prosecutors-urge-sentencing/)**
The enactment of these regulations follows the passage of a crime bill by the UK parliament in 2023, which facilitated the swift seizure of cryptocurrency assets.
Privacy coins were singled out in the press release as being particularly detrimental to the public good.
While cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC) and Ether (ETH) offer pseudo-anonymity through public ledgers, privacy coins afford users a higher degree of anonymity.
Despite the anonymity associated with wallet addresses, it was noted that once linked to an individual‚Äôs identity through procedures like Know Your Customer (KYC), all transactions conducted through that wallet can be traced and identified.
The announcement acknowledged that cryptocurrencies and nonfungible tokens (NFTs) have been exploited by drug dealers and fraudsters, leading to various investigations.
However, the new measures aim to curtail the exploitation of crypto for illicit purposes while fostering its legitimate potential to drive economic growth.
This concerted effort to regulate crypto is not unique to the UK, as evidenced by recent actions taken by law enforcement globally, including the arrest of the founders of Bitcoin mixer Samourai Wallet in the United States on charges of conspiracy to commit money laundering on April 24.
* * *
_To submit a [crypto press release (PR)](https://www.cryptointelligence.co.uk/category/press-releases/), send an email to [sales@cryptointelligence.co.uk](mailto:sales@cryptointelligence.co.uk)._

item.title: News Article 35
item.description:
Title: Indonesia's New Leadership Poised to Strengthen Crypto Economy Post-Election
URL Source: https://coinpaprika.com/news/indonesia-s-new-leadership-poised-to-strengthen-crypto-economy-post-election/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T05:51:52+00:00
Markdown Content: By [Jakub Lazurek](https://coinpaprika.com/news/authors/jakub-lazurek)
01 May 2024
2 min read
Indonesia's election winners vow to boost crypto sector, eyeing regional competitiveness ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[**Indonesia's**](https://coinpaprika.com/news/police-raids-10-sites-for-illegal-bitcoin-mining/) **presidential election concluded in February 2024, resulting in a win for Prabowo Subianto and Gibran Rakabuming**, who are seen as proponents of the cryptocurrency industry.
Key industry figures echoed this sentiment, believing their victory could positively affect the country's crypto sector.
**Subani from CFX and William Sutanto of INDODAX expressed optimism** about the new administration's impact on the crypto landscape.
Subianto has pledged to tighten regulations to curb tax evasion, while Rakabuming aims to nurture blockchain expertise among the youth.
**Both leaders are committed to fostering the cryptocurrency environment**, as confirmed after their official declaration as winners by the electoral commission on April 25.
There's a general expectation that they will maintain or enhance the existing crypto-friendly policies.
**Sutanto highlighted Rakabuming's potential to drive innovation in the blockchain and cryptocurrency sectors**, particularly given his appeal to the younger generation and strategic planning capabilities.
Sutanto hopes the new government will strongly endorse digital assets, enabling Indonesia to compete with regional players like [Thailand](https://coinpaprika.com/news/thailand-delays-plan-to-share-crypto/), the Philippines, and Vietnam.
**Despite not leading in transaction volumes, Indonesia has seen significant growth in registered crypto users** under President Joko Widodo, Rakabuming's father.
Widodo‚Äôs administration established the world's first national crypto exchange and a comprehensive tax framework, suggesting future tax incentives for crypto transactions.
These developments lay a promising groundwork for the new leaders, potentially elevating Indonesia‚Äôs position in the regional crypto market.
[Go back to All News](https://coinpaprika.com/news)

item.title: News Article 36
item.description:
Title: Internet Computer Accelerates Global Expansion Following Massive ICP Global Community Townhall
URL Source: https://droomdroom.com/internet-computer-accelerates-global-expansion/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T05:07:34+00:00
Markdown Content: Following a historical 24 hours / 12 segments [ICP Global Community Townhall](https://x.com/ICPHUBS/status/1784058307847897524) hosted on ‚ÄúX‚Äù which drew an audience of over 1.5 million attendees, Internet Computer (ICP) has announced ambitious plans for global adoption
Building on its momentum from a year of remarkable growth, Internet Computer unveils its groundbreaking ‚ÄúICP HUBS‚Äù adoption strategy, poised to elevate global adoption to new heights. With a focus on immersive experiences tailored for developers, professionals, enthusiasts, investors, ICP is set to redefine the standard for community engagement in the crypto sphere.
The cornerstone of this strategy is the introduction of 13 flagship ‚ÄúICP HOUSES‚Äù events scheduled throughout 2024, coinciding with major crypto and blockchain conferences worldwide. These two-day intensive gatherings will offer attendees a multifaceted experience, blending education, development, collaboration, and celebration under one roof.
> ‚ÄúGLOCAL (global + local) is the key for an effective adoption strategy. While 24 ICP HUBS are in full swing on a regional basis, ICP HOUSES will connect the dots around the world, providing valuable cross-pollination opportunities for the Ecosystem. ICP has both now.‚Äù > > According to Emilio Canessa, Head of Global Adoption at DFINITY Foundation
Designed as polyfunctional spaces, ICP HOUSES will host a diverse array of activities including educational sessions, hackathons, presentations, networking events, and even overnight stays for hackers. Attendees can expect an intimate and curated environment conducive to meaningful interactions with industry leaders, technical experts, and fellow enthusiasts.
The inaugural ICP HOUSES events kicked off in Seoul (for Buidl Asia) and Hong Kong (for Web3 Fest), and will be followed by 11 additional events in key locations including Switzerland, Germany, Turkey, Canada, Indonesia, Kenya, Poland, Vietnam, Thailand, Singapore, and India. Each event promises to provide a comprehensive overview of the burgeoning ICP ecosystem, bootstrapping collaboration and innovation on a global scale.
**ICP HUBS NETWORK: A Year of Remarkable Progress** ---------------------------------------------------
In just one year, the ICP HUBS NETWORK has undergone a remarkable transformation, evolving into a global decentralized network comprising 24 chapters with a presence in 40 countries. This unprecedented reach underscores the growing influence of Internet Computer as a driving force in the Web3 landscape.
Central to this expansion is the philosophy of ‚Äúglocal‚Äù empowerment, emphasizing grassroots community development and regional adoption. Through a network of decentralized hubs, ICP is redefining how stakeholders engage with blockchain technology, fostering collaboration and innovation from the ground up.
Representing a departure from traditional, centralized approaches, the ICP HUBS NETWORK signals a paradigm shift toward community-driven innovation and empowerment in the crypto world.
> [For more information about ICP HUBS and upcoming events, visit the HUBS Linktree.](https://t.co/4kyaBsHdVY)

item.title: News Article 37
item.description:
Title: China AMC's Bitcoin ETF to Open Door for Chinese RMB Investors
URL Source: https://cryptonews.com/news/china-amcs-bitcoin-etf-to-open-door-for-chinese-rmb-investors.htm
Published Time: 2024-05-01T04:01:51+00:00
Markdown Content: ![Image 1: Hongji Feng](https://cryptonews.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/IW-Profile-150x150.png)
Last updated: May 1, 2024 at 04:01 UTC | 1 min read
[![Image 2: an orange button with a white text on it](https://cimg.co/other/523/335247/banner-eng.png)](https://rapi.cryptonews.com/outgoing/523/1/9)
[![Image 3: new presales 2014 with an orange arrow pointing to it](https://cimg.co/other/844/337087/eng-sub-m-1.png)](https://rapi.cryptonews.com/outgoing/844/1/17)
![Image 4: Hong Kong](https://cimg.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/30090423/1714467862-1714467846915_processed.jpg)
The Bitcoin and Ethereum exchange-traded funds (ETFs) newly issued by China Asset Management Co. provide new investment channels for [Chinese currency](https://cryptonews.com/news/top-chinese-law-firm-analyzes-digital-yuan-aml-challenges.htm) holders.
In an [interview with Bloomberg](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-04-30/china-s-ev-and-solar-exports-are-powering-ahead-as-prices-slide), China AMC CEO Yimei Li stated that these ETFs represent a significant milestone in making cryptocurrency investments more accessible to mainland Chinese investors.
Chinese RMB Trading Counter for Potential Mainland Investors ------------------------------------------------------------
Though crypto trading is banned in mainland China, Li said that the official launch of the ETFs ‚Äúopens the door for a lot of RMB holders.‚Äù
Li also expressed her hope that there could be a ‚Äúnew opportunity‚Äù for mainland Chinese investors in the future to ‚Äúparticipate in this process.‚Äù
According to an announcement, [China AMC published](https://www.chinaamc.com.hk/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/ChinaAMC-HK-Launches-ChinaAMC-Bitcoin-ETF-and-ChinaAMC-Ether-ETF_final.pdf) on April 29, the new funds offer unprecedented flexibility for investors, accommodating both cash and in-kind transactions.
The company‚Äôs offering included trading counters in USD, HKD, and RMB, catering to both listed and unlisted shares. these ETFs are the only Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs that provide a Chinese yuan trading counter.
[![Image 5: dogeverse - dogeverse - dogeverse - dogeverse - dogeverse - dogeverse -](https://cimg.co/other/903/337270/dogeverse960200.png)](https://rapi.cryptonews.com/outgoing/903/1/5)
‚ÄúAs the opening up progresses, we definitely hope that multi-assets will be available for domestic investors,‚Äù said Li.
Asia‚Äôs First Bitcoin ETFs and Ethereum ETFs -------------------------------------------
With Ethereum and Bitcoin ETFs [launched today](https://cryptonews.com/news/hong-kong-launches-asias-first-spot-bitcoin-and-ethereum-etfs.htm), China AMC reportedly has an initial offering period (IOP) scale of $142 million, with HK$950 million for Bitcoin ETF and HK$160 million for Ethereum ETF.
> ChinaAMC said its IOP (initial offering period) scale today is: HK$950 million for ChinaAMC HongKong Bitcoin ETF; HK$160 million for ChinaAMC Ethereum ETF, totaling approximately US$142 million. Bitcoin ETF is about 6x larger than Ethereum. [https://t.co/9hgicVWsKc](https://t.co/9hgicVWsKc) > > ‚Äî Wu Blockchain (@WuBlockchain) [April 30, 2024](https://twitter.com/WuBlockchain/status/1785160219276071016?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
‚ÄúWe have witnessed top-down momentum pushing Hong Kong to become a global hub for Web3.0, this authority endorsement is pivotal as it underscores Hong Kong‚Äôs competitive advantage in the global virtual assets sector,‚Äù said China AMC (HK) CEO Tian Gan.
‚ÄúWe are fully embracing the mainstream transition of virtual assets by developing differentiated investment offerings to help clients achieve their investment goals in this new asset class,‚Äù said Gan.
[![Image 6](https://cimg.co/other/872/336967/960x200-eng.gif)](https://rapi.cryptonews.com/outgoing/872/1/12)

URL Source: https://beincrypto.com/fantom-meme-coin-fund/

Markdown Content: **At a recent event in Sydney, Michael Kong, CEO of [Fantom](https://beincrypto.com/learn/fantom-crypto/) Foundation, unveiled an ambitious $6.5 million initiative to revolutionize the meme coin sector. This announcement at the MemeGlobal event on April 30 marks a significant pivot towards safer and more structured meme coin launches within the crypto industry.**
The initiative will provide a 10 million Fantom prize pool to support teams that adhere to the foundation‚Äôs rigorous guidelines for launching meme coins.
Fantom Aims for a ‚ÄúSafe and Fair‚Äù Meme Coin Environment -------------------------------------------------------
Kong further explained what he described as ‚Äúsafer meme coins.‚Äù He shared his vision of a successful meme coin project as one that ensures a democratic token distribution. This helps to avoid concentration in the hands of a few large investors, which can lead to price manipulation and reduced market fairness.
Furthermore, he also elaborated on the strategic importance of these ventures for customer acquisition and growth.

[Cronje‚Äôs framework for meme coin](https://beincrypto.com/fantom-andre-cronje-eyes-meme-coins/) launches is designed to instill fairness and [security](https://beincrypto.com/learn/top10-must-have-cryptocurrency-security-tips/) from the outset. ![Image 7: fear and greed index](https://lh7-us.googleusercontent.com/wRv8VX_plfK44yeF9VIk6U3UgOCL8aA7N3NdjHetmzD-QRTftY4aUc_OKOZmLwDdx3rLFpmevGG29m5G-la_bubQTkQG2T6XWV6-6ZkQGUO9Fl3d4vgXpJlnNgy6WsJxIjIWeK12AXNDUVXWlnq0Ueg)
The Fear and Greed Index has dropped by 13 points to reach 54 out of 100, indicating widespread panic selling in the cryptocurrency market.
#### Latest Market Update:¬†
* Despite the recent launch of a Hong Kong ETF, the price of Bitcoin (BTC) plummeted to the $60,000 level.
* Altcoins including Bitcoin SV ($BSV), Ethereum Classic ($ETC), Solana ($SOL), [Ethena](https://www.coingabbar.com/en/price-prediction/ethena-price-prediction-is-this-the-start-of-bearish-trend"Ethena") ($ENA), and Stacks ($STX) experienced panic selling.
* In the last 24 hours, the Cosmos ($ATOM) token has shown significant growth, rising by over 5.29% during this period.
* Conversely, Areware ($AR) faced the most substantial downturn, dropping by more than 16.74% over the past 24 hours.
* The total volume of the crypto market in the past 24 hours surged by 32.32% to reach $90.44 billion.
* DeFi volume stands at $6.94B, comprising 7.67% of the total crypto market's 24-hour volume.
* Stablecoin volume reaches $84.94B, representing 93.92% of the total crypto market's 24-hour volume.
* Bitcoin dominance is at 53.32%, experiencing a decrease of 0.17% throughout the day.
#### Major Worldwide News Update:
* Before the FOMC interest rate decision, focus turns to the US labor market. Economists anticipate April's ADP to rise by 179k, slightly lower than March's 184k. However, JOLTs Job Openings are expected to decrease from 8.756M to 8.680M. A larger job openings decline and smaller employment increase could fuel bets on a September Fed rate cut, impacting wage growth and consumer spending.
* Today, the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) will announce America's monetary policy decision at 2 p.m. ET. Fed Chair Jerome Powell will reveal whether interest rates will be cut, raised, or maintained. Powell's subsequent press conference will be closely watched by global investors for insights into future monetary policy directions. The FOMC meeting spans April 30 to May 1.
* [Binance founder CZ](https://www.coingabbar.com/en/crypto-currency-news/binance-fraud-case-justice-or-crypto-catastrophe"BinancefounderCZ"), aka Changpeng Zhao, received a 4-month prison sentence, expressing gratitude for support on Twitter. He plans to focus on education post-release, affirming continued cryptocurrency investment. Despite DOJ's proposed 3-year term, Judge Richard Jones opted for leniency, citing lack of evidence of awareness of unlawful activities. The decision sparked debates on justice in the crypto industry.
* Fox's Eleanor Terrett reports optimism from issuers of leveraged ETH futures ETFs regarding SEC approval. Allegations of Ethereum as a security contrast SEC's past stance. Volatility Shares' 2x Ether Strategy ETF ($ETHU) plans June launch pending SEC approval. Gensler's view conflicts with SEC's previous classification. Consensys lawsuit challenges SEC's stance.
* Litecoin's Charlie Lee anticipates a spot LTC ETF approval by the SEC, citing similarities with Bitcoin. Lee expects initial demand disparities but foresees long-term optimism. Ethereum's PoS status complicates ETF approval, facing SEC delays and potential denials. Lee believes Ethereum's broader utility could drive higher demand if approved.
* Australia's ASX may approve spot Bitcoin ETFs from VanEck Australia and BetaShares by 2024 end, following U.S. and Hong Kong trends. Confidence from $53B AUM in U.S. ETFs drives Australian launches. Monochrome predicts $3-4B inflows in 3 years, citing demand from fund managers, SMSF investors, and retail.
* Lazarus Group, allegedly linked to North Korea, laundered $200M in stolen Bitcoin using sophisticated methods like coin mixers. Their use of platforms like Tornado Cash and Railgun raises concerns about blockchain security. North Korean hackers stole over $600M in crypto in 2023, highlighting their significant impact on the industry.
