item.description:
Title: Vitalik Buterin breaks down ‚ÄòBinius‚Äô as a way to speed up zero-knowledge proofs
URL Source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/vitalik-buterin-explains-binius-improve-zero-knowledge-proofs
Published Time: 2024-05-01T05:52:03.000Z
Markdown Content: The Ethereum co-founder expects ‚Äúmany more improvements‚Äù in binary-field-based proving techniques in the months ahead.
445 Total views
1 Total shares
![Image 1: Vitalik Buterin breaks down ‚ÄòBinius‚Äô as a way to speed up zero-knowledge proofs](https://images.cointelegraph.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=90,width=1434/https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2024-05/9db17f8f-01d5-4781-a808-d66dd58ac962.jpg)
Own this piece of crypto history
[Collect this article as NFT](https://mint.cointelegraph.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcointelegraph.com%2Fnews%2Fvitalik-buterin-explains-binius-improve-zero-knowledge-proofs&utm_source=cointelegraph_com&utm_medium=button&utm_campaign=articles)
Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin has discussed a new cryptographic proving system that aims to achieve greater efficiency for zero-knowledge proofs.¬†
In a blog post on April 29, Buterin [explained](https://vitalik.eth.limo/general/2024/04/29/binius.html) a system for highly efficient cryptographic proofs over binary fields called ‚ÄúBinius,‚Äù which aims to deliver significant performance gains over traditional proof systems such as zk-SNARKs.
Binius aims to achieve greater efficiency by performing computations directly over individual binary bits ‚Äî zeros and ones ‚Äî instead of larger numbers.
The motivation behind the system stems from the traditional [cryptographic proof systems](https://cointelegraph.com/explained/zero-knowledge-proofs-explained) like SNARKs (Succinct Non-Interactive Argument of Knowledge) and STARKs (Scalable Transparent Argument of Knowledge) working with larger numbers such as 64-bit or 256-bit integers.
Underlying data being processed often consists of small values like counters, indices, and boolean flags, however, by operating on bits directly, Binius can process this data more efficiently, Buterin said.
![Image 2: a diagram showing the process of a computer system](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2024-05/dc9c0ad5-0376-4a7e-8dd7-107d61e1cbb4.jpg)
_Binius protocol vizualised. Source: Vitalik Buterin_
According to [Buterin](https://cointelegraph.com/learn/who-is-vitalik-buterin), the new proving system offers improvements such as representing data as a multidimensional ‚Äúhypercube‚Äù of bits and using binary ‚Äúfinite fields‚Äù to allow for efficient arithmetic operations on bits and bit sequences.
It also employs a specialized encoding and decoding process that converts the bit-level data into a form suitable for ‚Äúpolynomial‚Äù processing and Merkle proofs, while maintaining the efficiency benefits of working in binary.
The binary system unlocks significant improvements for the core arithmetic of cryptographic proof systems making complex crypto applications more efficient and scalable.
Polynomials are often used in zk-proofs to encode data and computations in a way that allows for the verification of proofs without revealing the underlying information, hence the term ‚Äúzero knowledge.‚Äù
Buterin demonstrated the Binius protocol with complex mathematics beyond the scope of this article to show how it encodes data, generates proofs, and allows verifiers to check those proofs efficiently.
**_Related:_** [**_ZK-proofs introduce security challenges for developers_**](https://cointelegraph.com/news/zk-proofs-security-challenges-for-developers)
The concept was initially [proposed](https://eprint.iacr.org/2023/1784) by cryptographers Benjamin E. Diamond and Jim Posen in a 2023 whitepaper titled ‚ÄúSuccinct Arguments over Towers of Binary Fields.‚Äù
Overall, Binius aims to bring about significant performance gains over more traditional proof systems, especially for computations involving small values and bit-level operations.
‚ÄúI expect many more improvements in binary-field-based proving techniques in the months ahead,‚Äù Buterin concluded.
**_Magazine: [Big Questions: What did Satoshi Nakamoto think about ZK-proofs?](https://cointelegraph.com/magazine/satoshi-nakamoto-zk-proofs-bitcoin/)_**

item.title: News Article 41
item.description:
Title: The phenomenon of Meme Coins in 2024: the new tokens
URL Source: https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/05/01/the-phenomenon-of-meme-coins-in-2024-astonishing-profits-new-tokens-and-the-return-of-crypto-euphoria/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T06:00:00+00:00
Markdown Content: In the crypto landscape of 2024, the strong comeback of meme coins has been one of the most striking developments for internet-related tokens.¬†
These tokens, often inspired by viral images and Internet memes, have not only captured the attention of the public but have also generated surprising financial returns for investors who have seized the opportunity at the right time.
* [Dogwifhat (WIF): the current meme coin token](#Dogwifhat_WIF_the_current_meme_coin_token"Dogwifhat(WIF): the current meme coin token") * [Bonk (BONK): The Surprise of the Year](#Bonk_BONK_The_Surprise_of_the_Year"Bonk(BONK): The Surprise of the Year") * [The Pioneers: Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB)](#The_Pioneers_Dogecoin_DOGE_and_Shiba_Inu_SHIB"ThePioneers:Dogecoin(DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB)") * [Conclusions](#Conclusions"Conclusions")
Dogwifhat (WIF): the current meme coin token --------------------------------------------
At the top of the list of the most profitable meme coins is Dogwifhat ([WIF](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/dogwifhat/)). Launched on the Solana blockchain at the end of 2023, it saw its value skyrocket in 2024, recording an impressive increase of almost 2,000% compared to the launch price.
With a market cap that has exceeded 3 billion dollars, WIF has positioned itself among the top 40 tokens by market capitalization. The peak was reached in March, when its market value touched 4.75 billion dollars.¬†
Based on the viral image of a dog with a pink hat, WIF has drawn its strength mainly from the community that has formed around the token, even though intrinsically the project offers limited additional value to investors.
Bonk (BONK): The Surprise of the Year -------------------------------------
Another rising star has been Bonk (BONK), also a product of the Solana ecosystem and based on the image of a dog. The success of BONK has been lightning-fast, with a growth that has exceeded 23,000% since its launch. Much of this growth occurred in 2024, consolidating BONK as one of the brightest novelties of the year.
### Other Notable Meme Coin Tokens
* Pepe (PEPE) and Floki Inu (FLOKI) have continued to make waves in the meme coin landscape, capturing interest thanks to strong online communities and significant value increases. * Book of Meme (BOME) and Jeo Boden (BODEN) were two other tokens that attracted attention. BODEN in particular, inspired by Joe Biden, has managed to earn a place in the hearts of investors, despite the lack of a clear intrinsic value beyond entertainment and political satire.
The Pioneers: Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB) --------------------------------------------------
The two original meme coins, Dogecoin and [Shiba Inu](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/04/29/shiba-inu-meme-coin-the-latest-crypto-news-and-price-performance/), have also recorded positive performances in 2024. Dogecoin has seen a 70% increase while Shiba Inu has surprised with a 150% increase. Although these gains may seem modest compared to other new entries, they demonstrate the resilience and continued popularity of these tokens.
2024 has been a year of renewed optimism for the [cryptocurrency market](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/categoria/crypto/), partly thanks to the approval of ETFs on [Bitcoin](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/categoria/crypto/bitcoin/), significant updates to the [Ethereum](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/categoria/crypto/ethereum/) network, and a general positive atmosphere. These developments have helped reignite interest in meme coins, considered by many as a promising sector for short-term speculation and investments.
Solana has continued to dominate the meme coin sector, attracting billions of dollars in new investments. At the same time, platforms like Coinbase‚Äôs layer-2 have facilitated the creation and launch of new tokens, demonstrating how blockchain technology can be accessible and usable by a wider audience.
Conclusions -----------
The meme coin rally in 2024 was one of the most fascinating and surprising narratives of the year.¬†
These tokens have generated incredible amounts of value for bold investors.¬†
However, it is essential to remember that the sector remains highly volatile and risky.¬†
Investors should proceed with caution, arming themselves with research and a careful evaluation of risks before diving into these often turbulent waters.

Title: What is and how does the crypto exchange Kraken work
URL Source: https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/05/01/what-is-and-how-does-the-crypto-exchange-kraken-work/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T06:00:00+00:00
Markdown Content: Kraken is a famous American crypto exchange.¬†
It is one of the oldest, as the company was founded in 2011 in San Francisco, only two years after the creation of Bitcoin.¬†
Actually, if we only consider the crypto exchanges still in full operation, it is one of the very few still existing among those founded before the first Bitcoin halving in 2012.¬†
* [The history of the crypto exchange Kraken](#The_history_of_the_crypto_exchange_Kraken"ThehistoryofthecryptoexchangeKraken") * [Legal issues](#Legal_issues"Legalissues") * [The advantages of the Kraken crypto exchange](#The_advantages_of_the_Kraken_crypto_exchange"TheadvantagesoftheKrakencryptoexchange") * [The features](#The_features"Thefeatures") * [The guide](#The_guide"Theguide")
The history of the crypto exchange Kraken -----------------------------------------
The real crypto exchange, however, was launched only in September 2013, two years after the company was founded and in the midst of a bull market, and at that time it only offered exchanges in Bitcoin (BTC) and Litecoin (LTC). Then over time it greatly expanded its catalog.¬†
By the way, its co-founder Jesse Powell was a consultant for Mt. Gox before founding [Kraken](https://www.kraken.com/en-us), and Mt. Gox was the very first known exchange in the world that allowed the public buying and selling of Bitcoin, already in 2010.
With the closure of [Mt. Gox](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/04/23/great-news-for-bitcoin-creditors-of-mt-gox/) in 2014, other crypto exchanges took its place, including Kraken. At the time, the vast majority of BTC exchanges were happening on Mt. Gox, so when it closed, it opened the floodgates for competitors.
Indeed, the following month Kraken raised 5 million dollars from Hummingbird Ventures and [Bitcoin](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/categoria/crypto/bitcoin-en/) Opportunity Fund through a Series A investment. A month later, it became one of the first crypto exchanges to be listed on the Bloomberg Terminal.
In 2020, it became the first crypto exchange to become a SPDI (Special Purpose Depository Institution) in the USA.¬†
Among US crypto exchanges, it is the second most important, behind Coinbase, although there are also other non-US exchanges operating in the USA that record higher trading volumes than Kraken, starting from Crypto.com.¬†
What sets [Kraken](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/04/19/kraken-expands-in-the-usa-by-acquiring-tradestation-crypto/) apart, however, is its adherence to US regulations, to the point that it is sometimes used for institutional purposes.
Furthermore, it also supports the euro, making it one of the most widely used crypto exchanges in Europe, thanks to its branches on the continent.¬†
Legal issues ------------
The exchange, like many others, has had to deal with various legal issues, especially in the United States of America.¬†
Actually, to tell the truth, Kraken‚Äôs relationship with authorities in the past has been a bit turbulent.¬†
However, over time it seems that they have been able to resolve them all, like last year‚Äôs against the SEC accusing him of offering investment contracts without the necessary authorizations (for example for staking services).¬†
So on one hand it is necessary to highlight that the crypto exchange has had to face several legal issues in the past, but on the other hand it is also important to underline that they all seem to have been resolved, although sometimes with agreements that did not necessarily provide a complete absolution for not having committed any wrongdoing.¬†
The advantages of the Kraken crypto exchange --------------------------------------------
From a strictly technological point of view, Kraken does not seem to offer any particular advantages compared to other similar platforms.¬†
However, it offers a couple of advantages that may be interesting for some investors or speculators.
The first, as already mentioned, is compliance with regulations.¬†
Indeed, despite the fact that its actions have been contested several times from this point of view, in the end Kraken has always managed to come out of it in a way that complies with current regulations.¬†
So whoever chooses to use this exchange knows that in theory they should not run any risk, as far as US regulations are concerned. This level of compliance probably also applies to European markets, where Kraken is quite popular.¬†
The other advantage is the lack of major obstacles in the use of fiat currencies.¬†
When it comes to crypto exchange, various issues often arise with fiat currency transfers. Kraken seems to be one of the most reliable in this respect, also because it is quite well known to those who need to carry out these types of checks.¬†
Moreover, it does not have particularly high commissions, as sometimes happens with competitors, making it one of the best for deposits and withdrawals in dollars and euros.¬†
The features ------------
In addition to the classic spot crypto trading, in fiat currencies, stablecoins or other cryptos, the exchange also offers other features, but dedicated to a more advanced audience.¬†
First of all, they also allow trading of crypto futures.¬†
They also allow margin trading with leverage up to 5x.¬†
They also provide a Pro platform for more experienced users with greater needs, while the basic interface is dedicated to users with fewer needs or beginners.¬†
Moreover, it is also easily usable from the dedicated [smartphone app](https://www.kraken.com/it-it/features/cryptocurrency-apps), which makes its use very simple. However, Kraken offers its users three different apps, because in addition to the simple basic one, there is also the Pro version for more experienced users, and a [non-custodial wallet](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/04/18/kraken-launches-its-own-non-custodial-crypto-wallet/) for those who want to store their tokens without having to rely on them.¬†
One of the advanced level features they offer is Over-The-Counter (OTC) exchanges, designed for those who need to buy or sell very significant amounts of cryptocurrencies.¬†
Together with Coinbase, it is one of the largest OTC desks in the United States of America, precisely because of its high level of compliance.¬†
Also noteworthy is their customer service, which generally provides good quality service, 24 hours a day, seven days a week.¬†
The guide ---------
Using the basic features of Kraken is practically the same as using those of other exchanges.¬†
What changes is mainly the use of the Pro version, intended for more advanced users.¬†
In this regard, they have published [a guide](https://support.kraken.com/hc/en-us/articles/7039277907092-Getting-started-with-Kraken-Pro) that allows you to become familiar with advanced features.¬†
It must be said that generally the basic version is primarily suitable for beginners, or for those who really only need a few basic features.¬†
Anyone with even slightly more complex needs would do well to learn how to use the Pro version, also because on the basic version there is always the risk of having to pay higher fees, or in any case dealing with larger spreads. However, this discussion applies to any crypto exchange, not just Kraken.¬†
There is also a [generic guide](https://support.kraken.com/hc/en-us/categories/204677947-Getting-Started) for the entire exchange that also includes basic functionalities, but these are perfectly in line with those of any other exchange.¬†
The exchange is available in five languages, including not only English but also Spanish, French, Portuguese, and Italian. After all, it is mainly used in America and Europe.¬†
[![Image 1: Marco Cavicchioli](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/marco-cavicchioli_-_contributor-150x150.jpg)](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/author/marco-cavicchioli/"MarcoCavicchioli")
Born in 1975, Marco has been the first to talk about Bitcoin on YouTube in Italy. He founded ilBitcoin.news and the Facebook group" Bitcoin Italia (open and without scam) ".

item.title: News Article 43
item.description:
Title: The Cryptonomist
URL Source: https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/05/01/232294/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T06:00:00+00:00
Markdown Content: In this article we delve into the Birdeye platform: a tool that helps crypto trading enthusiasts research a wide range of on-chain data.
In particular, on Birdeye it is possible to find data related to market prices, volume, and depth of the less capitalized tokens, as well as social data and on-chain information.
The protocol also acts as an aggregator for cross-chain exchanges, relying on providers such as Mayan and Debridge. There is even a crypto airdrop at stake. Let‚Äôs see all the details below.
* [Birdeye crypto: the ideal platform for analyzing trading data of less capitalized tokens](#Birdeye_crypto_the_ideal_platform_for_analyzing_trading_data_of_less_capitalized_tokens"Birdeyecrypto:theidealplatformforanalyzingtradingdataoflesscapitalizedtokens") * [Birdeye and Debridge: how to farm the crypto airdrop?](#Birdeye_and_Debridge_how_to_farm_the_crypto_airdrop"BirdeyeandDebridge:howtofarmthecryptoairdrop?")
Birdeye crypto: the ideal platform for analyzing trading data of less capitalized tokens ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Birdeye is a platform founded in 2021 by Kha Nguyen, former head of product at Solscan, which acts as an **data aggregator** for the blockchains of [Solana](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/04/26/the-memecoin-airdrop-temporarily-reduces-the-cost-of-the-solana-phone-chapter-2/), Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, Avalanche and BNB Chain, simplifying research and analysis in the field of crypto trading.
Through this tool **traders can take advantage of a complete suite of information** extracted and analyzed thanks to a variety of machine learning techniques and [artificial intelligence](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/categoria/ai-eng/).
Highlighted on the homepage of Birdeye are data regarding trending tokens in the last 24 hours, the most profitable cryptographic addresses in the last 7 days, and a chart comparing the historical performance of native tokens and many other coins.
Similar to [GeckoTerminal](https://www.geckoterminal.com/en), this platform also features a search bar where you can search for cryptocurrencies, addresses, and reference markets for in-depth trading analysis.
![Image 1: Birdeye crypto trading](https://cryptonomist.ch/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/image-106-1024x351.png)
**Very interesting the ‚ÄúNew Listings‚Äù function that allows you to discover the new tokens** added to the [liquidity pool](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/01/10/pyusd-the-rise-of-paypals-stablecoin-in-the-fraxpyusd-liquidity-pool-on-curve/) in order to expose yourself as an early trader of a coin.
Often the opportunities to make a 100x return on your investment (maybe better to say gambling) are found in the least capitalized cryptos at the time of their listing on the market. At the same time, the risks multiply in this kind of activity: [scams](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/04/25/231751/) are unfortunately commonplace.
**On Birdeye there is also a section called, ‚Äú**_Find Gems_**‚Äú, which classifies all existing tokens based on customizable parameters** such as the most visited tokens, the most traded ones, those with the highest volumes, etc.
When we carry out this kind of research, we need to pay attention to the [TVL](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/01/06/ethereum-layer-2-historical-record-for-the-total-value-locked-tvl-of-21-billion/) (intended as liquidity locked in pools) of the tokens: a low TVL, typically less than a million dollars, highlights a completely unknown coin.
Above one million, while still remaining in an extremely dangerous territory, we could find options that are less risky and at the same time less profitable. Also keep an eye on the TVL/marketcap ratio.
![Image 2](https://lh7-us.googleusercontent.com/kPFUAVFXUVRz5Iud8-AQWPNPQvRGd_tpDAiGAcFhVo0U5YBx4AZSlLpzD34qr12vHn8RvxLcBP5SybHSmuXeb2u-RRlkwqBNeM8Ah_HKF7n9LlnUbH1b61QpZdUiPnP7GYdDJB3rXeELBaXS7dBZRD4)
**Other interesting features of the Birdeye trading data aggregator include the ability to place a limit order through the DEX** [**Jupiter**](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/01/03/jupiter-announces-the-airdrop-of-its-token-by-the-end-of-january/) **on the Solana blockchain**, to set alerts, add crypto to the watchlist, and observe the leaderboard of top traders.
The ‚ÄúCoin360‚Äù function is also available, which completely replicates the same data visualization work as the ‚ÄúCrypto Bubbles‚Äù platform.¬†
We can specifically monitor the top 100 tokens with the highest volume and price variation in the last 24 hours, across a large number of cryptographic networks.
Birdeye and Debridge: how to farm the crypto airdrop? -----------------------------------------------------
**Birdeye‚Äôs integrated platform also includes a section dedicated to ‚Äúcross-chain swaps‚Äù that significantly helps users move their assets from one chain to another, simplifying essential steps for optimal crypto trading.**
**To meet this need of the community, Birdeye relies on providers Mayan and [Debridge](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/04/13/who-sleeps-doesnt-catch-airdrop-check-eligibility-for-omni-network-and-earn-points-for-the-launch-of-debridge-crypto/) to offer fast and cost-effective asset transfers.**
**
**Using this tool is very simple**: just connect your [web3](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2023/06/03/most-used-dapp-platforms-web3/) wallet, select the reference protocol, indicate the sender and recipient chains, and enter the token data that we want to exchange.
![Image 3](https://lh7-us.googleusercontent.com/taYKTfIB8p2Ixu0siVYUXXEZtBoIH_kGMdmOQv-iixhf5YJjAWhWN_U3Sw50kNi6qqqyu9RJeYA3r7luBMYEiSSE9FMiTbVvybSnTXUzc4GFnexCtwrnu1rmh0P5-DyeYdWgO-ol8FXtybSBjxBqx08)
**As mentioned in the introduction, using this Birdeye function could help us become eligible for the crypto airdrop of the two platforms Debridge and Mayan**.
The first one has already announced the start of an incentive campaign for [points](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/03/27/the-rise-of-airdrop-points-in-new-cryptographic-projects-the-background-of-an-ambiguous-incentive-practice/), which will last for another two months: to obtain rewards of the next governance token of the platform, it is sufficient to use the bridge as many times as possible, preferably spanning across multiple coins and chains, aiming to generate the highest score possible.
**On Debridge it is advisable not to exchange more than 0.001 ETH per transfer if we are operating exclusively for the purpose of the airdrop**, as it is the most effective method to spend less in terms of [slippage](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2023/05/28/what-ethereum-mev-bots/) and earn the highest base score.
Attention because each transaction has a base fee of 4.2 dollars: the airdrop should still cover at least the expenses.
**For Mayan the speech is more complex because at the moment no airdrop campaign has been announced** even if using the protocol has served to be eligible for the [Wormhole](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/2024/03/07/wormhole-supported-by-coinbase-launches-617-million-tokens-a-breakthrough-for-crypto-users/) airdrop.
However, the platform does not yet have a governance token and after the recent $3 million funding co-led by 6MV and Borderless Capital and supported by VCs such as Solana Ventures, Arrington Capital, and Hash3.
To qualify for the potential airdrop, it is advisable to simply use the bridge as many times as possible in different months.
> 1/ üéâ Big things ahead! We announce today our funding round, co-led by 6MV and Borderless Capital, with support from industry leaders Anatoly Yakovenko of Solana, Saeed Badreg of Wormhole, and more. > > A huge thanks to our investors and the community for believing in our vision! [pic.twitter.com/u2jcqXmgMw](https://t.co/u2jcqXmgMw) > > ‚Äî Mayan üóø Gates of Solana (@MayanFinance) [April 11, 2024](https://twitter.com/MayanFinance/status/1778412320621834419?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)
**
**[![Image 4: Alessandro Adami](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/alessandro-adami-cryptonomist-150x150.jpg)](https://en.cryptonomist.ch/author/alessandro-adami/"AlessandroAdami")
Graduated in "Information, Media and Advertising", for over 4 years interested in the cryptocurrency and blockchain space. Co-Founder of Tokenparty, community active in spreading crypto-enthusiasm. item.title: News Article 44
item.description:
Title: Bitcoin Sinks Below $58K, Crypto Market Drops 9% in Run-Up to Fed Decision
URL Source: https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2024/05/01/bitcoin-sinks-below-58k-crypto-market-drops-9-in-run-up-to-fed-decision/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T08:22:29.128Z
Markdown Content: * Bitcoin fell in line with the wider crypto market, with ether and other altcoins also declining.
* Financial markets have been dogged by risk-off sentiment in the run-up to the Fed's interest-rate decision and press conference later today.
Bitcoin [(BTC)](https://coindesk.com/price/bitcoin/"BitcoinPrice|BTCPriceIndexandLiveChart-CoinDesk") sank below $58,000 during the European morning on Wednesday to the lowest level since the end of February as the world's largest cryptocurrency recorded its worst month since November 2022.
BTC has fallen almost 9% in the last 24 hours having dropped below the $60,000 support level late on Tuesday. The wider crypto market, as measured by the CoinDesk 20 Index ([CD20](https://www.coindesk.com/indices/cd20/)), has lost more than 8.5%.
Cryptocurrencies have been dogged by risk-off sentiment in the broader financial markets amid a stagflationary feel in the U.S. following indications of slower growth and sticky inflation that have tapered hopes of an interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve. The Federal Open Market Committee is due to give its latest rate decision later today.
Ether [(ETH)](https://coindesk.com/price/ethereum/"EthereumPrice|ETHPriceIndexandLiveChart-CoinDesk") also slipped some 9% while some of the other major altcoins, such as solana [(SOL)](https://coindesk.com/price/solana/"SolanaPrice|SOLPriceIndexandLiveChart-CoinDesk"), dogecoin [(DOGE)](https://coindesk.com/price/dogecoin/"DogecoinPrice|DOGEPriceIndexandLiveChart-CoinDesk") and avalanche [(AVAX)](https://coindesk.com/price/avax/"AvalanchePrice|AVAXPriceIndexandLiveChart-CoinDesk") registered losses in excess of 10%.
Bitcoin fell in April, returning its first monthly loss since August. The 16% decline was the worst since November 2022, when crypto exchange FTX imploded.
Edited by Sheldon Reback.

Title: If History Repeats, This Is How Bitcoin Price Will Perform In The Next 6 Months
URL Source: https://www.newsbtc.com/news/bitcoin/if-history-rhymes-bitcoin-price-next-6-months/
Published Time: 2024-05-01T08:20:16Z
Markdown Content: In a recent [thread](https://twitter.com/_Checkmatey_/status/1785454318633758868) on X (formerly Twitter), renowned on-chain analyst Checkmate provided an analysis regarding the future trajectory of Bitcoin. Currently, the premier cryptocurrency hovers around the $60,000 mark, a pivotal moment that echoes historical patterns within the Bitcoin market cycle.
What Will The Next 6 Months Bring For Bitcoin? ----------------------------------------------
Checkmate argues that Bitcoin is positioned in a ‚Äúchopsolidation‚Äù phase‚Äîa term coined to describe a stagnant yet volatile period. He suggests that this could last approximately six months, based on previous cycles, and potentially usher in a period of parabolic growth that could last between six to twelve months. ‚ÄúBitcoin [history tends to rhyme](https://www.newsbtc.com/analysis/btc/why-march-is-the-bloodiest-month-in-bitcoin-history/), and thus far, this cycle is no different,‚Äù Checkmate noted. ‚ÄúThe song sung during the last two cycles paints around 6-months of chopsolidation ahead of us, followed by 6-12 months of parabolic advance.‚Äù
![Image 1: Bitcoin Index Performance Since Cycle Low](https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/GMcyl10bcAEca1R.png?resize=3832%2C1714)
Bitcoin Index Performance Since Cycle Low | Source: X @\_Checkmatey\_
Supporting his analysis, Checkmate refers to April 2021 as a significant high point for Bitcoin for ‚Äúmany good reasons,‚Äù noting that despite a considerable monthly drop of over $8,250 in April, such movements are typical and often signify healthy market corrections. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs an -11.2% monthly pullback, and is extremely common during uptrends, and corrections are healthy and necessary,‚Äù he stated, reinforcing his confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs resilience and potential for recovery.
![Image 2](https://servedbyadbutler.com/error/blank.gif)
[![Image 3: a gold and black poker chip with the words huge get bonus](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4118444)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=2374568&setID=366606&channelID=0&CID=873125&banID=521839794&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2293217&adSize=728x90&mt=1714552706764098&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.newsbtc.com%2Fnews%2Fbitcoin%2Fif-history-rhymes-bitcoin-price-next-6-months%2F&hc=8faa5044e5d6cb3933ff94f720acb872e0b05803&location=)
![Image 4: Bitcoin Monthly Price Performance](https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/GMcz5nJbQAAvYx4.png?resize=3832%2C1714)
Bitcoin Monthly Price Performance | Source: X @\_Checkmatey\_
Further statistical backing comes from historical data focused exclusively on [Bitcoin halving](https://www.newsbtc.com/news/bitcoin/when-is-the-next-btc-halving-date-bitcoin-halving-guide/) years (2012, 2016, 2020, and 2024), which Checkmate used to illustrate that such month-over-month corrections are not outliers but rather common occurrences within the digital asset‚Äôs [cyclical trends](https://www.newsbtc.com/news/bitcoin/where-are-we-in-this-bitcoin-cycle/). The end of each year post-halving has historically shown strong performance, supporting the notion that the current price point could be a precursor to significant gains.
![Image 5: Bitcoin Index Performance Since Cycle ATH](https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/GMcy1hWaIAANSMh.png?resize=3832%2C1714)
Bitcoin Index Performance Since Cycle ATH | Source: X @\_Checkmatey\_
### Sell In May And Go Away?
Checkmate also retweeted a post from Charles Edwards. The founder of Capriole Investments [commented](https://twitter.com/caprioleio) on the market‚Äôs unprecedented bullishness, implying that a deeper correction is to be expected.
‚ÄúThis is starting to get ridiculous. Bitcoin has not had a run like this since inception. We are now 1 day short of the record set in 2011 for days without a meaningful dip \[more than 25%\]. If you are not prepared to accept some downside in this asset class, you shouldn‚Äôt be here. Especially now,‚Äù said Edwards. His remark highlights the unusual lack of severe downturns in the market, suggesting that investors should be prepared for potential volatility. [![Image 6: a gold and black poker chip with the words huge get bonus](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4118444)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=2374569&setID=452518&channelID=0&CID=873125&banID=521839794&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2293218&adSize=728x90&mt=1714552706847253&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.newsbtc.com%2Fnews%2Fbitcoin%2Fif-history-rhymes-bitcoin-price-next-6-months%2F&hc=664b795d24bf07ad11102d34563368c5acc35655&location=)
In another post on X, Edwards added a cautious note to the otherwise optimistic outlook. He advised, ‚ÄúSell in May and go away. This looks like distribution to me. As long as we trade below $61.5K, scenario (1) is technically more likely. A strong reclaim of $61.5K would give some hopes to the bulls for scenario (2). A flush would also be good for the sustaining continuation of the bull market, the sooner we get one, the better the long opportunities are.‚Äù
![Image 7: Bitcoin price analysis](https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/GMeJo8sbsAA5weC.jpg?resize=1318%2C872)
Bitcoin price analysis | Source: X @caprioleio
This perspective suggests a strategic withdrawal may be wise in the short term, implying that current market conditions might be more bearish than they appear and that a significant correction could potentially strengthen the market‚Äôs long-term prospects.
At press time, the BTC plunged to $57,691.
[![Image 8: a gold and black poker chip with the words huge get bonus](https://servedbyadbutler.com/getad.img/;libID=4118444)](https://servedbyadbutler.com/redirect.spark?MID=172179&plid=2374570&setID=452519&channelID=0&CID=873125&banID=521839794&PID=0&textadID=0&tc=1&scheduleID=2293220&adSize=728x90&mt=1714552706982965&sw=800&sh=600&spr=1&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.newsbtc.com%2Fnews%2Fbitcoin%2Fif-history-rhymes-bitcoin-price-next-6-months%2F&hc=f6bf9bca9acaa1c44a2198999db921f17f811288&location=)
![Image 9: Bitcoin price](https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/BTCUSD_2024-05-01_09-45-08.png?resize=3628%2C1673)
BTC price, 4-hour chart | Source: [BTCUSD on TradingView.com](https://www.tradingview.com/x/bxYtncUR/)

Title: EigenLayer sees over 12,000 queued withdrawals ‚Äî How far will TVL fall?
URL Source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/eigenlayer-12-000-queued-withdrawals-how-far-tvl-fall
Published Time: 2024-05-01T08:14:50.000Z
Markdown Content: Mass withdrawals started on April 29 after EigenLayer‚Äôs decision to ban U.S. and Canada-based participants from its upcoming airdrop.
![Image 1: EigenLayer sees over 12,000 queued withdrawals ‚Äî How far will TVL fall?](https://images.cointelegraph.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=90,width=1434/https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2024-05/e20582b7-8bd3-4d6a-9f14-8006fdbaecb5.jpg)
Own this piece of crypto history
[Collect this article as NFT](https://mint.cointelegraph.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcointelegraph.com%2Fnews%2Feigenlayer-12-000-queued-withdrawals-how-far-tvl-fall&utm_source=cointelegraph_com&utm_medium=button&utm_campaign=articles)
EigenLayer ‚Äî the largest Ethereum restaking protocol ‚Äî has received over 12,412 withdrawal requests following widespread disappointment surrounding its planned EIGEN airdrop.
Mass withdrawal requests started on April 29, when EigenLayer saw over 4,336 daily withdrawals, rising to 6,496 on April 30, [according](https://dune.com/queries/3636372/6124104) to Dune data.
![Image 2](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2024-05/f155c61e-7516-401f-b778-4ffe246356bb.png)
_Daily EigenLayer withdrawal queue count. Source:_ _Dune_
The restaking protocol amassed over 12,412 withdrawals in the past three days, which started on April 29 after EigenLayer [released a white paper](https://cointelegraph.com/news/eigenlayer-eigen-whitepaper-bans-airdrop-us-users) on its EIGEN token. However, several jurisdictions were excluded from the airdrop, including the United States, Canada and several African and Asian countries.
EigenLayer has over 107,000 unique depositors, [according](https://dune.com/queries/3592801/6052719) to Dune. In the past three days, the 12,412 withdrawals suggest that 11.6% of unique depositors have withdrawn from the protocol.
While the size of the individual withdrawals can‚Äôt yet be traced, the 11.6% of queued withdrawals would reduce EigenLayer‚Äôs current $14.8 billion total value locked (TVL) to just above $13 billion.
Since EigenLayer has a seven-day withdrawal processing period, the effects of the mass withdrawals will only become visible in the following weeks.
The ban of key economic jurisdictions from the EigenLayer airdrop has caused widespread disappointment that will affect the protocol‚Äôs TVL, according to Anndy Lian, intergovernmental blockchain expert and author of _NFT: From Zero to Hero_. He told Cointelegraph:
> ‚ÄúParticipants from these regions might have contributed significantly to EigenLayer‚Äôs TVL. Their exclusion could lead to a decrease in the overall TVL, especially if they were actively restaking their assets.‚Äù
![Image 3](https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2024-05/bb41d09c-ef72-4ecb-b0fc-7549c63efcb0.png)
_Eigenlayer TVL. Source: Dune_
**_Related:_** [**_EigenLayer on the brink of potential yield crisis_**](https://cointelegraph.com/news/eigenlayer-brink-potential-yield-crisis)
Airdrop farmers are searching for new restaking protocols ---------------------------------------------------------
EigenLayer‚Äôs TVL fell over 4% during the past week, while Karak‚Äôs TVL rose 20.5% to $439 million, making it the second-biggest restaking protocol on Ethereum, [according](https://defillama.com/protocols/Restaking) to DefiLlama.
The new restaking protocol‚Äôs rapid growth led to speculation that Karak has a ‚Äúgood chance‚Äù of [becoming the next EigenLayer](https://cointelegraph.com/news/karak-good-chance-becoming-next-eigenlayer), following the EIGEN airdrop debacle.
Beyond the disappointing airdrop, Karak also introduces technical benefits to users while offering more flexible restaking tokens, according to Lian:
> ‚ÄúKarak introduces unique technical features such as multi-asset restaking and a plug-and-play development environment. These could provide Karak with an edge in attracting developers and users seeking a more versatile restaking platform.‚Äù
**_Related:_** [**_Crypto on track to hit 1B users by end of 2025 ‚Äî Analyst_**](https://cointelegraph.com/news/crypto-on-track-1-billion-users-end-2025-analyst)
